title: Software Engineer
description: ComfortDelGro Bus Pte Ltd is a wholly-owned subsidiary of ComfortDelGro Corporation Limited, which is one of the largest land transport companies in the world with a global workforce, a global shareholder base and a global outlook. The ComfortDelgro Private Bus (CDGB) business is pivoting and transforming to a digital platform company and is on a talent hunt for passionate and experienced Technology professionals to be part of this digital transformation.We are looking for a Software Engineer to be part of the team that is developing a modern cloud-based transport services platform that connects our passengers, drivers, clients and service providers together.Responsibilities  To work closely together with the Product Manager; in providing technical advice and solutions to deliver the desired business outcomes.  Participate in the full Agile development process with requirements analysis, application design, development, implementation and features release.  Rapid prototyping and code review.  Conduct user training on application systems and provide on-going production support.  Manage change requests and provide quick and efficient solutions.  Maintain system procedure and documentation according to established standards.Requirements  Degree in Computer Science or equivalent  At least 3 years of working experience in design and development of application product/system.  Good understanding of software engineering best practices and experience in Agile methodology.  Strong programming skills in C# with .NET / .NET Core with experience in React.js and SQL.  Experience in cloud technology, Map SDK/API or transportation domain is an added advantage.  Good analysis and problem-solving skills, attention to detail.  Excellent verbal communication skills.

title: Senior Software Engineer
description: Make A Real Difference At PropertyGuru.Real Aspirations. Real People. Real impact.At PropertyGuru Group, we believe that every person – no matter what their circumstance – should have a place to call home. That’s why we’ve been on a mission to transform how people find, finance, and own homes across Southeast Asia in the last 14 years. Voted by property seekers as “Asia’s Most Influential Brand for Online Property Search”, PropertyGuru enables real-world aspirations through digital transformation and constant innovation. Every day, the work that we do has a real and positive impact on thousands of lives. As an employee, you’ll be empowered by our values and work culture, where everyone has autonomy, support, and resources to be confident creators of amazing software. As we evolve in our journey to help people make confident property decisions, we stay true to our core values to guide the way we work and the decisions we make every step of the way: we own it and deliver it, we have fun, and celebrate success, we respect and care for each other, we push beyond good, and we create what’s next. And we need someone like you to embrace these values as Senior Software Engineer in the PG Automation team that focuses on business process automation and enterprise integrations.Responsibilities  Design, implement and maintain high-quality backend microservices and integration applications with a focus on NFRs like robustness, scalability, reusability, extensibility, security, and performance.  Provide technical leadership to a team of top engineers and technical consultants who build applications to run back-office operations of PG group and build data integrations between those SaaS (CRM, ERP, marketing) and in-house applications.  Play a key role in architectural initiatives and building technology roadmaps balancing long-term platform velocity and short-term stakeholder needs.  Lead architecture/design reviews, code reviews, post-mortems, and advocate engineering best practices.  Build, maintain and share technical documentation like architecture diagrams, ER  UML diagrams to communicate design, proof of concept  experiments in technology for relevant technical, product, or business stakeholders.  Collaborate with cross-functional teams  squads.Requirements  Bachelor’s/Master’s degree in Computer Engineering(or similar)  7+ years of overall experience in back-end or full-stack development with a focus on building architecting and building large-scale, highly available enterprise-grade services and applications.  1+ years of proven technical leadership experience.  Exposure to serverless, distributed, event-driven, cloud architecture  applications and asynchronous messaging systems.  Strong proficiency in any programming language – TypeScript, JavaScript (node.js and related frameworks), Ruby, Java.  Data modeling experience in Relational and NoSQL databases.  Exposure to cloud platform services and application development using AWS or Azureor Google Cloud.  Exposure to containerization and advanced CI/CD methodologies.  Possess the following behavioral competenciesBias for actionAgile mindset with a focus on productivity o Data-driven decision makingPositive and collaborative attitudeFostering open communicationAttention to detail  Exposure to iPaaS solutions, SaaS integrations is a plus.

title: Software Engineer - Fullstack
description: Basic Roles and ResponsibilitiesYour mission if you choose to accept it, will be as follows:● Able to develop web clients in JS, HTML, CSS, JQuery with frameworks like Angular, React or Vue or PHP Laravel. Familiar with UI design tools.● Develop backend services in NodeJS (and related frameworks) for high throughput, large volume transactions for video delivery, interfacing to microservices with XML, JSON and HTTP Rest APIs.● Mature knowledge of internet networking concepts and principles, able to design around REST APIs using HTTP/S. Firm foundation on TCP/IP, PKI principles.● Experience using an Agile development process that includes CI/CD automation (Eg Jenkins, Ansible, Chef), and cloud environments for local, staging and production. Ensure code repos are secure and accounts for access are controlled. Git flow and industry experience in release management is a must.● Ability to communicate technical design and articulate well, the problem, as well as possible solutions. Able to understand different viewpoints, consider tradeoffs, risk and returns, work with teammates to assess decisions that maximize desired outcome. Being independent, yet willing to seek help when needed is desirable.● Knowledge and experience working with HTTP cookies and how retargeting works through cookie syncing. Prior experience in Adtech is a preference.● Strong ability to write efficiency SQL queries and work with SQL and NoSQL databases.● Develop code that uses AWS services such as ElastiCache, API Gateway, SNS, SQS, DynamoDB, PostgresSQL, Firehose, ELB, Cloudwatch, Lambda and fluent around configuring EC2 instances for balanced performance and cost efficiencies.● Develop code using SOLID principles, unit tests and clear documentation. Strong belief in software engineering to deliver desired outcomes, and not just output.● Knowledge of Linux tools and shell scripting is a must.● Experience using Apache Solr is a preference.● Experience using and deploying containerized services is a preference.Key Skills● Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science/Engineering, with at least 4 years of hands-on experience as a software engineer for a cloud services provider using the tools and languages stated above.● Practical understanding of AWS or Google cloud infrastructure tools and services, preferably with certifications.● Fluent written and verbal communication ability with English.● Familiar with startup environments, able to multitask and extend support into new areas through self learning and inquiry.● Excellent attitude and A team player personality; humble, hungry and smart.

title: Senior Backend Software Engineer (C#)
description: Are you an individual who is independent, self-motivated, and passionate about healthcare? Are you keen to take your career to the next level? As a Senior Backend Software Engineer (C#), you will be involved in the entire product development process, from conception to deployment, as well as the development of backend code, RESTful APIs, and web applications. We offer you the opportunity to be part of a multi-functional and dynamic team, working closely with Product, Marketing, and Business Development. Joining us should appeal to you not just because we respect and value our employees but because we are a place where passion and dedication are rewarded with opportunities for professional and personal growth.Duties and Responsibilities • Implement backend solutions to WhiteCoat's products using C# and ASP.net • Write functional test cases to automate quality assurance • Design complex backend web RESTful API • Optimize solutions for usability, performance, and security • Collaborate with QA and Product in specifications and design reviews to drive solutions towards standardisation • Provide insights based on in-depth knowledge of the products and features • Identify and champion innovations and improvements to help drive the growth of the businessRequirements • A Bachelor’s Degree in Computer Science or a related field • A minimum of 5 years working experience in the field of backend software engineering • Possess prior experience working with C# and ASP.net, Windows Server, and relational databases such as Microsoft SQL or similar technologies • Familiarity with cloud servers (AWS, GCP) integration, DNS handling and SSL configuration • Familiarity with OOP design and architecture • A high level of curiosity about how things work and a willingness to break things down to figure that out • Excellent written and verbal communication skills • Strong problem-solving skills and a passion for solving head-scratching challenges; able to quickly diagnose and solve code problems • A proven ability to learn quickly and adapt under pressure; able to work independently and within a team • A self-starter who can power through ambiguity and thrive in a fast-paced, dynamic start-up environment

title: Software Engineer (Nucleus)
description: We have a great opportunity for a talented and self-motivated Software Engineer to join NCS. At NCS, we seek to nurture talents in creating and developing innovative solutions. If you are passionate about new technologies and new ideas, NCS could be a place for you!If you have strong programming fundamentals, analytical skills, learning agility and positive working attitudes towards challenges, accelerate your Tech Career with us by embarking on an enriching and rewarding career path with NCS, Asia's leading ICT company.The ideal profile should have / be:  Diploma in Computer Science/Computer Engineering/Information Technology related field, or equivalent practical experience.  No experience required.  Proficient in .NET or Java, or equivalent.  Experience in full stack, frontend/backend software development will be added advantage.About us:  NCS is a member of the Singtel Group and the leading information, communication and technology (ICT) service provider.  NCS is passionate in delivering the best applications and services to our clients in the various sectors – government, financial and commercial.  We embrace the company's core values in everything we do.  We believe that a strong pipeline of talent drives sustainable business success – the right people in the right roles, at the right time.  We also believe that managing one's career is a partnership. At every stage of your career, you will find many avenues for learning and development.

title: Software Engineer, Android
description: Every month, billions of people access Facebook products using mobile devices from across the world. Our mobile teams constantly push the boundaries of the user experience across all our apps, including Facebook, Instagram, WhatsApp, Workplace, Messenger, and more, as a leader in an exciting and fast-paced industry that is evolving daily. We are seeking full-time Android Developers to join our mobile teams. As a Mobile Software Engineer, you will specialize in building elegant products on world-class technologies that bring our social experiences to billions of people, anytime and anywhere.We are looking for developers with experience in user interfaces, infrastructure, and/or tools supporting applications on Android using the Android SDK. If you are interested in joining a world-class team of passionate people and industry veterans who like to work hard and play hard, we look forward to hearing from you soon!RESPONSIBILITIES  Work closely with our product and design teams to build new and innovative application experiences for Android  Implement custom native user interfaces using the latest Android programming techniques  Build reusable Android software components for interfacing with our back-end platforms  Analyze and optimize UI and infrastructure application code for quality, efficiency, and performanceMINIMUM QUALIFICATIONS  Experience building maintainable and testable code bases, including API design and unit testing techniques  Experience with multithreading programming and mobile memory management  Experience in understanding code bases, including API design techniques  Experience with Java language and frameworks  Experience with Multi-Threading and memory management specific to mobile devices  Experience with caching mechanisms  Knowledge on UI design principles and making apps work

title: Senior Software Engineer - JS
description: We at Cake aspire to transform and decentralize finance with tomorrow’s technology, with a globally distributed and close-knit team of doers and getters. Here’s an opportunity to join a movement to break the mold. Join Cake and help us shape the future of personal finance.About CakeCake DeFi is a Singapore-based blockchain and fintech company that empowers users to be in control of their finances by creating cash flow and harnessing the potentials of Decentralized Finance. Founded in 2019, we currently have more than 60 employees of various backgrounds and nationalities, and growing. Read more about our company at www.cakedefi.com.Cake DeFi also actively contributes to the open-source DeFiChain project. DeFiChain is a DeFi (Decentralized Finance) blockchain that, at the time of writing, has 380m USD of liquidity locked in its DEX (Decentralized Exchange), a market cap of more than 1 billion USD. It is the largest non-Turing complete blockchain and is based on Bitcoin. You will have the opportunity to work on DeFiChain at Cake. Read more about DeFiChain at www.defichain.com.We at Cake aspire to transform and decentralize finance with tomorrow’s technology, with a globally distributed and close-knit team of doers and getters. Here’s an opportunity to join a movement to break the mold. Join Cake and help us shape the future of personal finance.This is a full-time position based in Singapore.What you’ll do:  Collaborate with cross functional engineering teams to design and develop open-sourced TypeScript/C++ based Blockchain SDK for DeFiChain.  Write highly performant TypeScript and C++ codes that are clean, simple, maintainable and battle tested with test-driven development (TDD) for maximum test coverage automated from pull request all the way to release.  Take an active responsibility in creating highly scalable blockchain modules for our scaling needs.  Taking on the polyglot hat and deep diving into multi code bases (C/C++/JS/TS/Rust) to contribute and understand how things work under the hood.  Engineering low level performant blockchain data indexes with LSM databases such as leveldb/rocksdb with deep technical knowledge of how it worksWhat you’ll need:  Ability to pickup and understand multi programming languages in addition to JavaScript such as C, C++ and Rust is required.  Proficiency in TypeScript/JavaScript and C++ with at least 2 years of experience working in either Embedded, Web, Node or Mobile technologies.  Experience working in a fast pace tech-driven startup as a software engineer or similar capacity. We will cater to your strengths and preferences as much as we can when deciding who does what.  Ability to take full ownership and work independently while collaborating with others in a fast-paced agile team.  A collaborative and resourceful individual with excellent communication skills able to make radical decisions while being empathetic and respectful.  Passionate about creating high impact work in the DeFi space with ability to deliver quality solutions without mentorship.  Experience participating/maintaining in open source software development is highly preferred.  Deep technical understanding of blockchain technologies, cryptography, BIPs, DeFi, UTXO or Nakamoto Consensus is highly preferred.  Willingness to to pick up new emerging and bleeding edge blockchain technologies such as Bitcoin scripting, Ethereum, Web3.js and etc.Why work with Cake:  Do something with purpose; Be a part of the future that will shape how people interact withCrypto and Blockchain-based personal finance.  Fast moving, challenging and unique business problems.  International, diverse work environment and flat hierarchy.  Great career development opportunities in a growing company.  Competitive salary.  Flexible working hours, unlimited discretionary leave and no work attire.Cake DeFi is a Singapore-based blockchain and fintech company that empowers users to be in control of their finances by creating cash flow and harnessing the potentials of Decentralized Finance. Founded in 2019, we currently have more than 30 employees of various backgrounds and nationalities, and growing.

title: Senior Full Stack Software Engineer

title: Senior Software Engineer (Backend)
description: About the TeamWe are building the best restaurant platform to handle the full cycle of dining marketing and operation. The ChopeBook platform we built, has enabled over 5,000 restaurants, seating 30 million diners across 7 regions. By applying state-of-art engineering and AI technologies, our team is on a mission to create Asia’s next-generation restaurant platform, digitalizing one of the biggest industries to the smart world!About the roleAs a lead level engineer, you will lead a small 3-6 full-stack agile team, which directly impact the platform growth. The role is expected to collaborate with Chope merchant product owners as well as with stakeholders across the feature plan, tech solution, and engineering delivery.What you'll do  Lead a full-stack agile team to deliver product features and stability features  Design and develop high-quality backend systems using PHP and Go programming languages  Provide technical solutions for both functional and non-functional features  Provide solid and reliable documentation on completed work items such as code, concepts, business logic, and logistics  Follow application architecture standards, policies, and procedures  Ensure the code is optimized and the platform performance is not affectedSkills  experiences required  8+ years of essential PHP/Golang development experience  Good experience in software engineering in a distributed systems environment (like MySQL, ES, Redis, Ngnix)  Good Knowledge of OOP principles and best practice in PHP and/or Go programming  Possess excellent communication with the product owner, designer, and stakeholders  Knowledge of performing unit testing and make use of Git  Reliable knowledge of design patterns, DatabaseWhile not required, the following skills/experience will be favourably considered  Familiar with the agile development process and basic team management skills  Familiar with Go  Familiar with front-end programming languages and frameworksWhat you’ll get from Chope  Meaningful work that allows you to fulfill your purpose by doing the biggest job you’ve ever done for a mission you believe in  Experience the full life cycle of architecture enhancement, including Cloud Native, Microservices, and Engineering efficiency  Leadership enablement  Competitive salary  Substantial employee referral incentivesWhat is Chope?The word “Chope” in Singapore means to reserve a seat in a fast food restaurant, sometimes by placing a packet of tissue paper on it.  We provide software to restaurants to manage their businesses (https://www.chope.co/singapore-restaurants/join_us) , a reservation platform (iOS and Android apps and web https://www.chope.co ) for consumers to book restaurants that’s also integrated with restaurants and partners like Google and Tripadvisor and a deals platform for consumers to get discounts on their dining.  Founded in Singapore in 2011, Chope has offices in 7 cities across Asia. Happy dining!We regret to inform that only shortlisted candidates will be contacted

title: Software Engineer
description: Blockchain Solutions Pte Ltd (BSG) is a Singapore-based digital platform company focusing on developing the next generation of business applications that utilises blockchain technology for trust and provenance.Our Mission is to be the leader in developing blockchain based applications. We believe in the power of blockchain to simplify asset identity management, roles of intermediaries, trustee and custodianship, speed up execution of transaction and storage of digital information. Development can focus from initial PoC to full production product, building upon blockchain foundation layer and other technology stacks to solve interesting real-world problems in a variety of sectors. title: Principal Software Engineer
description: Why Work for UsWe Power the Nation.Make the most of your talents and develop products that can create an impact on a national scale. We are an in-house software team, assembled to move with speed and deliver with quality.We Build Reliable Solutions. For Customers, Company, and Country.You will be part of the Digital Technology Team and together, you will innovate, create, and deploy digital products that will empower more than 3,800 employees within SP Group and improve the quality of life for the 1.5 million commercial, industrial and residential customers that SP Group serves. We build solutions that enable sustainable high-quality lifestyles, help consumers save energy and cost, and support national goals for a sustainable livable city. Now, imagine the impact you can create.OverviewSP Group is looking for a Full Stack Engineer to join the Digital team (https://www.spdigital.io/) to design and build applications and services for operational and new innovation needs. We are the team in SP Group spearheading the digitization efforts. We operate like a startup within the organization, moving with speed and delivering with quality.The Commercial and Industrial (CI) team is a unit in SP Digital - Engineering that focuses on building innovative solutions to help commercial and industrial facilities in their journey to achieve sustainability and energy efficiency goals.The CI team designs, builds, and operates production applications serving commercial and industrial facilities. The applications comprised of responsive web portals, sustainability displays, microservices, IoT applications, and data flow with integration to field devices such as meters, inverters, sensors, and building management systems.What You’ll Do:  Collaborate with cross-functional teams to define, design, and build performant modern web applications and services.  Build high-quality web applications and services by writing clean and modular code.  Write unit and integration tests to ensure robustness and reliability of web applications and services.  Measure and improve performance of microservices.  Catalyse growth within the team through code reviews and pair programming to maintain high development standards.  Investigate operational issues to find the root cause and propose improvements.What You’ll Need:  5+ years of experience in professional software development.  Experience in backend development using a general-purpose programming language.  Proficiency in Golang is a big plus.  Experience in frontend development.  Proficiency in modern React stack is a big plus.  Experience in architecting and developing distributed systems.  Experience in database and API design.  Proficiency in timeseries database and GraphQL is a plus.  Experience in writing unit and integration tests.  Proficiency in TDD is a plus.  Good understanding of DevOps concepts, CI/CD pipeline, Kubernetes, Docker.  Strong passion and skill for investigating operational issues to find the root cause.  Possess a high level of attention to detail and consistency.  Can-do mindset, critical thinking, and pursuit of engineering excellence.  Being both a great individual programmer and a great team player.We regret that only shortlisted candidates will be notified.

title: Lead Software Engineer, IT - Core (FPMS)
description: Job Purpose· The Lead Software Engineer will work   with respective business users, business analysts, project managers and other   stakeholders and take ownership to ensure the overall delivery of project,   system enhancement and initiatives based on the committed project timelines   and quality.· In addition, the candidate is also   required to manage the planning and execution of daily, monthly batch job   processing in a way to meet the system SLA.Job Description· Design and develop solutions as according to user requirements by meet the agreeable timeline, quality and performance standards.· Analyze functional and technical solution requirements and participate in functional and technical solution specifications.· Be able to supervise and manage a team of 3-5 software engineers.· Hands on development experience on Java/J2EE applications and able to deliver tasks independently.· Participate in source code reviews, code merges and review of code quality.· Coordinate and work with business users, business analysts, project managers and other stakeholders on day to day basis on Production Support, DevOps and database related issues.· Be able to analyze logs from servers and troubleshoot issues.· Develop Restful Web Services in J2EE using JAX-RS and other libraries. Strong understanding of the web services architecture and Service Oriented Architecture (SOA).· Takes accountability in considering business and regulatory  compliance risks and takes appropriate steps to mitigate the risks.· Maintains awareness of industry trends on regulatory  compliance, emerging threats and technologies in order to understand the risk and  better safeguard the company.· Highlights  any potential concerns /risks and proactively shares best risk management practices.Our Requirements· Preferable Degree in Computer Science, Business Information System, Insurance or related field.· At least 8-12 years of relevant working experience.· Strong design and programming skills in Java and related server side technologies. (Java, J2EE, Struts, Spring, and Hibernate, REST APIs).· Strong technical skills in SQL, PL/SQL Programming.· Knowledge and experience with micro services will be added advantage.· Knowledge in container technologies (Docker, Kubernetes) will be added advantage.· Experience in DevOps tools will be added advantage.· Experience in Insurance domain will be added advantage.· Strong leadership, problem solving and interpersonal skills.· High level of integrity,  takes accountability of work and good attitude over teamwork.· Takes  initiative to improve current state of things and adaptable to embrace new  changes.About Great EasternEstablished in 1908, Great Eastern places customers at the heart of everything we do. Our legacy extends beyond our products and services to our culture, which is defined by our core values and how we work. As champions of Integrity, Initiative and Involvement, our core values act as a compass, guiding and inspiring us to embrace the behaviours associated with each value, upholding our promise to our customers - to continue doing our best for them in a sustainable manner.We work collaboratively with our stakeholders to look for candidates who exhibit or have the potential to embrace our core values and associated behaviours, as these are the key traits that we expect from our employees as they develop their careers with us.We embrace inclusivity, giving all employees an equal opportunity to shine and play their role in exploring possibilities to deliver innovative insurance solutions.Since 2018, Great Eastern has been a signatory to the United Nations (UN) Principles of Sustainable Insurance. Our sustainability approach around environmental, social, and governance (ESG) considerations play a key role in every business decision we make. We are committed to being a sustainability-driven company to achieve a low-carbon economy by managing the environmental footprint of our operations and incorporating ESG considerations in our investment portfolios; improving people’s lives by actively helping customers live healthier, better and longer; and drive responsible business practices through material ESG risk management.To all recruitment agencies: Great Eastern does not accept unsolicited agency resumes. Please do not forward resumes to our email or our employees. We will not be responsible for any fees related to unsolicited resumes.

title: Software Engineer, Back-End
description: Are you excited about transforming the way we bank by using the latest technology? We are too!We are forming a new technology team, adopting the latest tech, modern tools and new ways of working to implement integration solution of various banking systems including Avaloq, Temenos and other wealth management and banking solutions. You will need to be familiar with database concepts, data migration, ETL and different standard data transformation protocol including FIX and SWIFT.You will be collaborating in a diverse and inclusive team with an entrepreneurial mindset. On missions, you will be part of a squad and pair with your peers to create transformative outcomes - from inception to reality.We believe in creating and applying knowledge through sharing. So, our technical career path specifically supports that you will code no matter of your seniority level, grow, and share your knowledge through collaboration, both internally and externally.What is your next idea? Let us know!YOU  Want to transform what banking means  Are an experience Back-end Software Engineer with experience in NodeJS, API and web socket technologies as well as design and implementation of APIs  Are familiar with ETL tools such as IBM ITX and different data transfer protocol such as JSON, FIX, SWIFT  Are excited about Cloud-native technologies, Infrastructure as Code and automation  Have applied knowledge of Continuous Integration  Continuous Delivery  Are familiar with Swagger, Postman or similar API development tools  Are familiar with integration architecture; with plus in banking domain  Are used to Agile Software Development practices  Work independently  Love to solve complex problems and find the best viable solution for the userBenefits  Snacks  Drinks  Health Insurance  Technical Career Path  Academy Program with Buddy-MentorWE  Want to transform what banking means with you!  Are inclusive and diverse  Are committed to creating a flexible, supportive work environment that helps you effectively manage your work and family commitments  Embrace innovate-thinking and entrepreneurship in everything we do  Are award winning and known for our commitment to outcomes  Apply the latest tech and new ways of working  Support your personal growthApply by sending us your link to your git/code repo, inclusive of your CV and a short summary of you.

title: Software Engineer (Java/Python/Go/NodeJS)
description: COMPANY DESCRIPTION    NE Digital is the digital, data and technology organization that serve as a center of excellence to drive digital transformation for our group of NTUC Social Enterprises to meet the critical social needs of Singapore's community. Delivering innovative products and solutions, we empower our people to lead a better and meaningful life through digital services in the area of daily essentials, health and community care, childcare and education as well as financial services.The TeamWe believe that diversity is key to driving an innovative, cohesive, productive and fun workplace! Hence, at NE Digital our people join us from all around the world. Be sure to be soaked in an environment with different ethnic groups driving innovation and injecting some creative juice as one!Contributing to a social purpose through technology, our team of passionate and dedicated folks are spread into different social enterprises such as NTUC Fairprice Group, NTUC First Campus, NTUC Health and among others!Creating technologies that impacts!    RESPONSIBILITIES    NE Digital is currently hiring for Software Engineer to join the Developer Experience(DX) TeamDX team responsible for development and maintenance of the common tools and products used by developers within NE Digital. Mission of DX is to enable developers with right tools and processes to make their life easier and happier.You will be reporting to the Team Lead and working alongside with the core development and digital business teams (developers, tech leads). You will help to scope and brainstorm new product requirements, always thinking on bringing the best experience to our developers.Write clean code to develop functional backend server applications.Participate in design and development of various microservices.Participate in technical discussions to ensure the stability, availability and security of the system under high load.Participate in technical sharing sessions and thus evangelise the products developed by the DX teamWork closely with the developers from other teams to on board them to the products / tools developed by the DX team..QUALIFICATIONS    At least 2-4 years of Golang development expertise or Javascript (Node.js) / Java / Python Development experienceExperience of end-to-end software design and architecture (serverless, containers)Experience with Redis, NoSQL Databases, Relational DatabasesExperience with third-party libraries and their APIsExperience with REST and various HTTP VerbsAutomation with CI/CD tools (Github Actions, CircleCI, Bitbucket Pipelines)Experience of building scalable and highly available products using microservicesExcellent analytical skills with a good problem-solving attitudeMetrics-driven approach to make decisions, and continuous deploymentAbility to perform in a team environmentExperience of any agile development methodologiesExperience in developing or maintain Cloud Application through at least one provider among AWS, GCP, or AzureGood coding habits, excellent design ability , love programmingPositive and optimistic, strong sense of responsibilityGood team player with excellent communication skills and cooperation ability    OTHER INFORMATION    AWS / GCP Certifications (Associate Level)    Please note that your application will be sent to and reviewed by the direct employer - NE Digital

title: Finance Technology – Regulatory Reporting Software Engineer, Associate
description: Job DescriptionThe Finance Risk Data and Controls (FRDC) Technology organization is seeking strong engineer who wants to join an inspiring and curious team of technologists dedicated to improving the design, analytics, development, coding, testing and application programming that goes into creating high quality software and new products in Regulatory Reporting Technology function.The ideal candidate enjoys building, supporting, and the evolution of software applications, and has a strong understanding of designing and building applications in a variety of technologies as well as manage communication with stakeholders. In this role, a successful candidate will:  Manage and support a portfolio of production applications which includes vendor, in-house, on premise, and SaaS applications  Make sound architectural decisions around Regulatory Reporting application components  Identify gaps and weaknesses in existing applications and design and implement remediation of these gaps  Work to improve the stability of applications in the production environment  Ensure changes to the applications follow a disciplined change management processes including all documentation, reviews, and approval steps  Ensure adherence to design and coding standards  Define and execute test cases for quality of deliverables  Liaise with stakeholders from various teams which includes Finance, Corporate Controllers, Product Controllers within the region as well as global for all cycles (development, testing, implementation, post release)Qualifications  BS/BA Degree in Computer Science/Finance or equivalent  Application architecture analysis and design  5 years or more of experience in SQL, preferable in Oracle PL/SQL  3 years or more in Python or Java or equivalent development experience  Hands on experience in writing complex SQL queries and defining DB objects.  Good Knowledge on Stored Procedures/Packages, Functions and Triggers  Applicant must have strong English and Mandarin written and oral communication skills to effectively liaise with our China stakeholders  Strong Unix and Shell scripting knowledge  Strong analytical  problem-solving skills  Familiar with Agile methodology  Able to work under pressure and tight timeline  Strong Excel knowledge  Windows OS  Source control tools, preferably SubversionAbout UsJ.P. Morgan is a global leader in financial services, providing strategic advice and products to the world’s most prominent corporations, governments, wealthy individuals and institutional investors. Our first-class business in a first-class way approach to serving clients drives everything we do. We strive to build trusted, long-term partnerships to help our clients achieve their business objectives.We recognize that our people are our strength and the diverse talents they bring to our global workforce are directly linked to our success. We are an equal opportunity employer and place a high value on diversity and inclusion at our company. We do not discriminate on the basis of any protected attribute, including race, religion, color, national origin, gender, sexual orientation, gender identity, gender expression, age, marital or veteran status, pregnancy or disability, or any other basis protected under applicable law. In accordance with applicable law, we make reasonable accommodations for applicants’ and employees’ religious practices and beliefs, as well as any mental health or physical disability needs.About the TeamOur professionals in our Corporate Functions cover a diverse range of areas from finance and risk to human resources and marketing. Our corporate teams are an essential part of our company, ensuring that we’re setting our businesses, clients, customers and employees up for success.

title: Senior Software Engineer
description: About Doctor AnywhereDoctor Anywhere is a regional tech-enabled omni channel healthcare service company, headquartered in Singapore. With a strong network of established healthcare providers and experienced doctors, our digital platform and mobile app enable users to manage their health easily and effectively where they can consult a licensed local doctor anytime, anywhere, and get medication delivered to their doorsteps within hours.Under the DA Network clinics, users also have access to a panel of general practitioners, specialists, and allied healthcare providers. Complementing this ecosystem is the DA Marketplace where users can shop for a wide range of health and wellness products and services all in one place.We now serve more than one million, and growing users and our aim is to increase healthcare accessibility and provide affordable health care for everyone. Join us to help everyone lead happier and healthier lives!Our team and the role we are hiring forWe are seeking an enthusiastic and self-motivated Software Engineer to join our Engineering team to work on large scale, complex system that brings innovation to healthcare. You will be working on modern technology stack and in a cross-functional environment that promotes collaboration within/across teams and managing both internal/external stakeholders.You will be responsible for all aspects of product development from initialization till rolled-out. You will be working with other engineers on architecture, design, implementation, testing, and production support. The ideal candidate will have strong ownership, good communication skills, enjoy working in highly collaborative and fast paced environments.This role reports directly to the Engineering Manager.Responsibilities  Collaborate with team members to define, design, and ship new features.  Continuously discover, evaluate, and implement new technologies to maximize development efficiency.  Ensure the performance, quality, and responsiveness of applications.  Identify and correct bottlenecks.  Help maintain code quality, organisation, and automatization.  Develop applications for time-sensitive projects while considering business/system requirements.  Assist with estimating work efforts required for each phase of a project.  Identify and raise technical risks.  Maintain working knowledge of IT industry and trends.  Promote a risk-aware culture, ensure efficient and effective risk and compliance management practices by adhering to required standards and processes.Requirements  Bachelor's degree in Computer Science with 5-8 years of relevant experience in enterprise applications, preferably in Spring framework or .Net, Struts and Web services, UI frameworks (AngularJS, ReactJS etc.)  Fresh graduates welcome to apply  Excellent problem solving and analytical skills.  Strong knowledge of the software development life cycle, SCM tools and CI/CD pipeline.  Strong communication skills with proven ability to present complex ideas and document in a clear and concise way.  High energy, motivated team player, able to drive assigned projects and key initiatives to completion.  Experience of working within a tech startup and hyper growth environment.  Comfortable with fast paced operations and not be afraid to "roll up your sleeves" to get things done.  Strong written and verbal communication skills.

title: Senior Software Engineer (Frontend)
description: Carro is on a mission to redefine what car ownership is, and transform the way that people and businesses across Asia interact with one another to get the cars they need. Our digital platforms are game-changers in the automotive trading industry, seamlessly integrating the buying and selling user journeys for speed, efficiency, and transparency. Since 2016, Carro has continually disrupted the existing business models and practices within the automotive trading industry, launching numerous market-first services, and grown to more than 800 people across 4 countries in Southeast Asia. Our platform serves nearly every need that car owners have, and does it in a more tech-enabled, efficient, and delightful way. Today, Carro transacts more than $1Bn in cars annually, and has won numerous industry awards for innovation and marketing excellence.We’re looking for a Senior Software Engineer (Frontend) who can work seamlessly with our developers, designers and other stakeholders to deliver high-quality application. Are you one of those that meticulously build neat-and-high-quality javascript, dive into UI details, and debug performance issues? If so, read on!What you will be doing:  Work closely with the various stakeholders (product, designers, DevOps, tester) to design, develop and deploy high-quality web applications  Write clean, testable code with unit tests  Work closely with the development team to identify and resolve performance and scalability issues  Work closely with the UI/UX design team and enable the bridging of the gap between UI design and technical implementation  Participate proactively in code reviews to maintain a high-quality testable code cultureWhat you will need:  Bachelor in Computer Science / Software Engineering or at least 5 years of development experience in an agile team  Good working knowledge of HTML, CSS, Javascript especially React.js (with a preference for modern JS frameworks such as ReactJS, VueJS, NextJS..etc).  Good working knowledge of backend web framework such as Laravel (preferred), Ruby..etc  Good working knowledge of RDBMS like MySQL, PostgreSQL and etc  Familiarity with web performance optimization techniques  Experience working with a product-based organization, e-commerce, automotive is advantageous

title: Senior Software Engineer
description: About usFairmart is an early-stage community commerce company with a mission to help local stores thrive in the digital age. It is our belief that local stores should have access to the same capabilities that larger businesses have, but built for their scale. To achieve this, we take a multidisciplinary approach to building solutions that are simple to use, yet powerful in their impact.We're based in the JTC Launchpad - the heart of Singapore's startup community.We are a diverse team of technologists and builders who love to see the direct impact of our work on the lives of our customers. Those who are successful at Fairmart are intensely curious and bring a fierce passion to their work. You should be results-oriented, but also be people-oriented and understand the broader context of each problem you solve. Our culture is our competitive advantage, and you will have a unique opportunity to nurture its evolution and growth.Our founders bring a combined 25 years of experience from industry giants such as Shopback, Redmart, and DJI. The company is supported by prominent VCs such as Entrepreneur First, HAX, and SOSV.As a Senior Software Engineer, you will  Build a seamless, beautiful customer experience with React  Redux that feels comfortable and effortless for our customers.  Work on building highly scalable APIs (NodeJS  AWS Amplify).  Work with smart, motivated people in a supportive environment.  Influence others and build consensus using your strong written and verbal communication skills.  Enjoy a strong culture of wanting to be better and making it happen.  Feel empowered to try things out and make a real difference to our teams and our customers.About you  5+ years of experience as a Software Developer.  Critical thinker and problem-solving skills.  Deep Javascript knowledge.  Excellent knowledge of browser troubleshooting and debugging practices and techniques.  Are enthusiastic about learning and diving deeply into new, unfamiliar technologies.  Team player who enjoys working with a small team in a fast-paced environment.  Sense of ownership and pride in your performance and its impact on the company’s success.  Are excited about taking a customer-facing product from conception to execution and are excited about digitising the retail industry.  Care about writing clean, well-documented code.Bonus  BA in Computer Science or similar relevant field.  Experience with React, Redux or similar stack.  Experience with NodeJS  DynamoDB  AWS experience or desire to learn.  Experience with TDD, BDD and other forms of automated testing.  Experience with Agile Methodologies such as Scrum or Kanban.  Knowledge of SEO principles.Perks and Benefits  Exciting opportunities as we take our platform to the global market.  Refreshingly flexible but professional environment.  Competitive salary commensurate with experience.  The chance to join the ship early on and go all the way path to the recognised leader in the industry.  Great career and development prospects - being able to push the boundaries of what is possible.Please note, this position is open to Full Stack Engineers as well as people specialized in Frontend/Backend individually.Check out our website: https://fairmart.app/

title: Software Engineer (C++ & Video streaming skillset)
description: Mind PointEye Pte Ltd is one of few in the industry which master both cloud intelligence and edge intelligence techniques. Our business focuses on RD of AI algorithms and AI Chips, our product lines focus on both cloud and local intelligence related products (ADAS, smart service robots, smart transportation, smart airport solution etc.) based on our core AI algorithms and AI chip solution. Mind PointEye’s original and unique "local intelligence" algorithm was rated as the second in the "Top 10 AI Technologies of the World in the Past 10 Years" by Google Scholar in 2017, which is quite influential in the AI field. It first proposed the "Learning-on- Chip (LOC)" technology in the world. The chip module integrates a highly generalized core algorithm with online learning capabilities to enable "AI + IoT" and to reach a solid milestone. At the same time, Mind PointEye cooperates with more than 10 industrial leading enterprises domestically and overseas to develop leading intelligence software systems, intelligent hardware and intelligent terminal products, laying out in "AI + 5G" as well as "AI + industries".Role  Responsibilities:  Assist the Software Development Leader to conceptualize, develop and implement application projects  Develop, design and deploy technology related to our streaming initiatives, focusing on rendering and      performance as well as availability, latency and scalability   Write clean, maintainable, cross-platform and multithreaded code both for the client, containerized backend microservices  Provide detailed estimation for the development of solutions  Contributing to all phases of the development lifecycleJob Requirements:  Bachelor’s in Computer Science/Computer Engineering or relevant IT experience  2+ years of professional programming experience in C++ under a Linux environment  Experience in building Docker images and fetch/promote and deploy to Production  Experience in video streaming storage, delivery, transcoding, and streaming services  Understanding, or previous experience with (streaming) media is a must: container formats like MP4 or MPEG2-TS, codecs (AVC/HEVC/AAC etc.) and encryption  Good knowledge and experience of streaming, performance, networking and client programming  Knowledge of software process, quality, version control and testing methodologies  Fast learner, able to pick up new knowledge / skills related to the tasks within reasonable time  Creative, independent and good problem-solving skill  A collaborative team player who is passionate about technology

title: Software Engineer - Backend
description: We are an early stage stealth startup based in Singapore and the US backed by experienced entrepreneurs, engineers, and data scientists, aiming for creating a better human hive by restoring trustworthiness of information and uncovering hidden insights in public information and in teams and enterprises, using novel approaches involving machine learning, mechanism design, and behavioral design.You have a rare combination of passion in both software engineering and algorithms or mathematical modeling. You’re comfortable with designing novel algorithms, and you’re comfortable with translating mathematical models and solutions into computationally efficient algorithms or data structures, and have some ideas on how to implement it in a scalable way in the system. You can be a fresh graduate, but you already had some internship experience and exposure to how software engineering is done in industry.Most likely, you have done competitive programming or math and computer science competitions in national or international scope in the past, and you enjoyed the challenge of modeling and solving difficult problems.In your work, you will be interacting with our engineering, product, and data science team with a diversity of experience, to collaborate in tackling problems such as: discourse modeling, reputation modeling, trust graph design and implementation, graph analysis and traversals, scalable information retrieval and search indexes, and others.You will also participate in product planning, design review, and code review process.Qualifications:  Strong computer science fundamentals with a top tier educational background in Computer Science or other quantitative majors. title: Software Engineer, Analyst, Trade Surveillance, Singapore
description: Job DescriptionAs a member of our Software Engineering Group, we look first and foremost for people who are passionate around solving business problems through innovation and engineering practices. You'll be required to apply your depth of knowledge and expertise to all aspects of the software development lifecycle, as well as partner continuously with your many stakeholders on a daily basis to stay focused on common goals. We embrace a culture of experimentation and constantly strive for improvement and learning. You’ll work in a collaborative, trusting, thought-provoking environment—one that encourages diversity of thought and creative solutions that are in the best interests of our customers globally.In this role, you will support the current suite of Surveillance and Analytics system providing the aforementioned trade surveillance detection pattern alerts/reports for multiple Corporate  Investment Bank (CIB) Markets trading products for critical regulatory mandates. You will also be participating in the design and build-out of a bank-wide strategic transactional surveillance and analytics platform employing complex data processing, transaction pattern detection, data analytics and suspicious activity investigation capabilities.The responsibilities for this role include, but are not limited to the following:  Collaborating with high-performing teams and individuals throughout the firm to accomplish common goals  Be part of Global Surveillance Technology Application Development team to own the end to end architecture design, build and delivery.  Join one of our 5 Singapore based scrum teams, practice scrum ceremonies.  Work directly with global based compliance users and closely partner with DevOps team.  Follow established software engineering and SDLC best practices to ensure code quality, platform performance, stability and scalability  Assist in Level 3 production support.Requirements:  B.S. degree in Computer Science, Engineering or a related discipline  2 years or more of experience in Core Java and Java EE  Experience in application development of distributed mission-critical Trading or Transactional Analytics systems  Agile development methodology and test driven development. Familiarity with automated tools as such Maven, Jenkins and Cucumber  Experience in developing high-quality interactive UI and UX using Java WebUI technologies such as Angular-JS and Node-JS  Experience with database programming to design and build enterprise-scale and high-volume Oracle data processing applications using packages, procedures, triggers, PL/SQL, Java Stored Procedures  Ability to work under pressure and take ownership of issues. Sense of urgency to solve problems and propose solutions  Strong analytical and problem-solving skills. Able to multi-task, proactive and attention to detailAdditional Preferred Requirements:  Application development experience in delivering complicated enterprise Investment Banking application for Market Surveillance, or Investment Banking Front-office Trading Systems or Analytics Systems in FX, Commodities, Equities and Equities Derivatives domains  Experience in AWS Cloud, Kubernetes and Docker  Experience in Python, Scala, Spark  Experience in Kafka streaming  Experience in KDB, big data related systems  Financial Products knowledge of Futures  Options, FX, Commodities, Equities and Equities Derivatives, as well as trade lifecycles and/or order workflow  Experience in data engineering and data science, machine learningAbout UsJ.P. title: Embedded Software Engineer
description: Job Responsibilities  Work closely with team members to develop embedded FPGA/micro-controller based firmware operating in custom, thermal control thermal hardware used to support semiconductor test.  Responsibilities include all phases of FW development including defining the architecture, developing firmware, test and debug, documentation and working with HW engineers validating system operation.  Tasks will include developing communications protocols for inter-device communications and low-level drivers to communicate with IC devices such as EEPROMs, DACs, ADCs, and other peripherals.Job Requirement  Bachelor's degree in Computer or Software Engineering or equivalent engineering disciplines, with minimum 5 years of experience in developing embedded software and working with debug tools.  Fluent in C++ with excellent software architecture skills.  Recent embedded uC or DSP programming experience.  Experience with coding closed loop control environments in embedded uC/DSP environments.  Experience with use of floating-point units and implementing complex mathematical functions in embedded environments.  Experience with developing code to communicate over SPI, I2C, CAN, USB, RS232/485, TCP/IP in an embedded environment DACs, SRAM and Flash memory  Development of boot-loader utilities to reconfigure uC/DSP firmware over primary communications bus.  Ability to interpret and support legacy code.  Familiarity with basic thermodynamics would be helpful.

title: Software Engineer, Trade Surveillance, Associate
description: Job DescriptionAs a member of our Software Engineering Group, we look first and foremost for people who are passionate around solving business problems through innovation and engineering practices. You'll be required to apply your depth of knowledge and expertise to all aspects of the software development lifecycle, as well as partner continuously with your many stakeholders on a daily basis to stay focused on common goals. We embrace a culture of experimentation and constantly strive for improvement and learning. You’ll work in a collaborative, trusting, thought-provoking environment—one that encourages diversity of thought and creative solutions that are in the best interests of our customers globally.In this role, you will support the current suite of BAU Sage Analytics and Surveillance system providing the aforementioned trade surveillance detection pattern alerts/reports for multiple Corporate  Investment Bank (CIB) Markets trading products for critical regulatory mandates. You will also be participating in the design and build-out of a bank-wide strategic transactional surveillance and analytics platform employing complex data processing, transaction pattern detection, data analytics and suspicious activity investigation capabilities, and migrate the BAU alerts/reports to the new strategic platform.The responsibilities for this role include, but are not limited to the following:  Collaborating with high-performing teams and individuals throughout the firm to accomplish common goals  Support the migration of the existing BAU Compliance Web trade surveillance system developed on FLEX/Java Script Web UI and Sybase SQL back-end, to the new strategic platform  Be part of the Global Surveillance Technology AD organization spread across of US and APAC to provide end to end design, build and delivery  Follow established software engineering and SDLC best practices to ensure code quality, platform performance, stability and scalability  Assist in Level 3 production support.Requirements:  B.S degree in Computer Science, Engineering or a related discipline  4 years of experience in Core Java and Java EE  Experience in application development of distributed mission-critical Trading or Transactional Analytics systems  Experience with database programming to design and build enterprise-scale and high-volume Oracle data processing applications using packages, procedures, triggers, PL/SQL, Java Stored Procedures  Experience in developing high-quality interactive UI and UX using Java WebUI technologies such as Ext-JS, D3.JS or Angular-JS  Agile development methodology and test driven development. Familiarity with automated tools as such Maven, Hudson, Jenkins or Gradle  Ability to work under pressure and take ownership of issues. Sense of urgency to solve problems and propose solutions  Strong analytical and problem-solving skills. Able to multi-task, proactive and attention to detailAdditional Preferred Requirements:  Application development experience in delivering complicated enterprise Investment Banking application for Market Surveillance, or Investment Banking Front-office Trading Systems or Analytics Systems in FX, Commodities, Equities and Equities Derivatives domains  Scala or Python experience, SpotFire and Cloud Technology  Experience in Kafka streaming  Experience in KDB, big data related echo systems  Financial Products knowledge of Futures  Options, FX, Commodities, Equities and Equities Derivatives, as well as trade lifecycles and/or order workflowsAbout UsJ.P. Morgan is a global leader in financial services, providing strategic advice and products to the world’s most prominent corporations, governments, wealthy individuals and institutional investors. Our first-class business in a first-class way approach to serving clients drives everything we do. We strive to build trusted, long-term partnerships to help our clients achieve their business objectives.We recognize that our people are our strength and the diverse talents they bring to our global workforce are directly linked to our success. We are an equal opportunity employer and place a high value on diversity and inclusion at our company. We do not discriminate on the basis of any protected attribute, including race, religion, color, national origin, gender, sexual orientation, gender identity, gender expression, age, marital or veteran status, pregnancy or disability, or any other basis protected under applicable law. In accordance with applicable law, we make reasonable accommodations for applicants’ and employees’ religious practices and beliefs, as well as any mental health or physical disability needs.About the TeamOur Corporate Technology team relies on smart, driven people like you to develop applications and provide tech support for all our corporate functions across our network. Your efforts will touch lives all over the financial spectrum and across all our divisions: Global Finance, Corporate Treasury, Risk Management, Human Resources, Compliance, Legal, and within the Corporate Administrative Office. You’ll be part of a team specifically built to meet and exceed our evolving technology needs, as well as our technology controls agenda.

title: Frontend Software Engineer, Global Payments

Familiar with key concepts like functional and asynchronous programming, closures and types, layouts, specificity, animation, cross browser compatibility, data security and accessibility.  Good understanding of multi-tier application architecture and protocols, familiarity with product and software development lifecycle process.  Working proficiency in writing and speaking English.Preferred qualifications  Agile, quick self learner, highly self-motivated with strong sense of product ownership, and creative problem solver.  Deeply passionate about software coding/development and building great mobile/web applications.  Good collaborator and team player, comfortable working in a fast moving, culturally diverse and globally distributed team environment.

title: Senior Software Engineer
description: Why Work for UsWe Power the Nation.Make the most of your talents and develop products that can create an impact on a national scale. We are an in-house software team, assembled to move with speed and deliver with quality.We Build Reliable Solutions. For Customers, Company, and Country.You will be part of the Digital Technology Team and together, you will innovate, create, and deploy digital products that will empower more than 3,800 employees within SP Group and improve the quality of life for the 1.5 million commercial, industrial and residential customers that SP Group serves. We build solutions that enable sustainable high-quality lifestyles, help consumers save energy and cost, and support national goals for a sustainable livable city. Now, imagine the impact you can create.OverviewThe Payments and Consumer team is at the core of powering the payments network for different products at SP Group. The Payments and Consumer team is also responsible for the backend that controls the consumer apps experience for our iOS and Android apps and defining the key core components to build robust and scalable architecture for Consumer Apps. We are looking for candidates who are passionate about building scalable consumer-facing products and to help our product teams, business, and partners to iterate faster. A successful candidate in this role is self-driven, passionate, and should be willing to execute consistently in an agile, fast-paced environment.What You'll Do:  Development of the critical payments backend systems that power different products at SP Group  Development of backend systems that drive the iOS and Android consumer apps  Delivery operations, release management, and integration testing of systems  Work with all internal and external stakeholders for agile product delivery  Proactive communication and status reporting both internally and externally  Collaborate with SP staff and contractorsWhat You'll Need:  Possess a Degree in computer science and/or related discipline  Experience with Unix/Linux environments.  Experience coding APIs inGo/Java/Javascript  Knowledge of distributed systems  Experience in the field of software engineering, working with data structures, algorithms, and software design.  Experience with CI/CD using Jenkins  Good to have experience with Docker, Kubernetes, Terraform  Good to have experience with messaging systems like Kafka, RabbitMQ  Experience with relational databases like Postgres, MySQL, etc.We regret that only shortlisted candidates will be notified.

You will also be participating in the design and build-out of a bank-wide strategic transactional surveillance and analytics platform employing complex data processing, transaction pattern detection, data analytics and suspicious activity investigation capabilities, and migrate the BAU alerts/reports to the new strategic platform.The responsibilities for this role include, but are not limited to the following:  Collaborating with high-performing teams and individuals throughout the firm to accomplish common goals  Support the migration of the existing BAU Compliance Web trade surveillance system developed on FLEX/Java Script Web UI and Sybase SQL back-end, to the new strategic platform  Be part of the Global Surveillance Technology AD organization spread across of US and APAC to provide end to end design, build and delivery  Follow established software engineering and SDLC best practices to ensure code quality, platform performance, stability and scalability  Assist in Level 3 production support.Requirements:  B.S. / M.S. degree in Computer Science, Engineering or a related discipline  4 years of more of experience in Core Java and Java EE  Experience in application development of distributed mission-critical Trading or Transactional Analytics systems  Experience with database programming to design and build enterprise-scale and high-volume Oracle data processing applications using packages, procedures, triggers, PL/SQL, Java Stored Procedures  Experience in developing high-quality interactive UI and UX using Java WebUI technologies such as Ext-JS, D3.JS or Angular-JS  Agile development methodology and test driven development. Familiarity with automated tools as such Maven, Hudson, Jenkins or Gradle  Ability to work under pressure and take ownership of issues. Sense of urgency to solve problems and propose solutions  Strong analytical and problem-solving skills. Able to multi-task, proactive and attention to detailAdditional Preferred Requirements:  Application development experience in delivering complicated enterprise Investment Banking application for Market Surveillance, or Investment Banking Front-office Trading Systems or Analytics Systems in FX, Commodities, Equities and Equities Derivatives domains  Scala or Python experience, SpotFire and Cloud Technology  Experience in Kafka streaming  Experience in KDB, big data related echo systems  Financial Products knowledge of Futures  Options, FX, Commodities, Equities and Equities Derivatives, as well as trade lifecycles and/or order workflowsAbout UsJ.P. Morgan is a global leader in financial services, providing strategic advice and products to the world’s most prominent corporations, governments, wealthy individuals and institutional investors. Our first-class business in a first-class way approach to serving clients drives everything we do. We strive to build trusted, long-term partnerships to help our clients achieve their business objectives.We recognize that our people are our strength and the diverse talents they bring to our global workforce are directly linked to our success. We are an equal opportunity employer and place a high value on diversity and inclusion at our company. We do not discriminate on the basis of any protected attribute, including race, religion, color, national origin, gender, sexual orientation, gender identity, gender expression, age, marital or veteran status, pregnancy or disability, or any other basis protected under applicable law. In accordance with applicable law, we make reasonable accommodations for applicants’ and employees’ religious practices and beliefs, as well as any mental health or physical disability needs.About the TeamOur Corporate Technology team relies on smart, driven people like you to develop applications and provide tech support for all our corporate functions across our network. Your efforts will touch lives all over the financial spectrum and across all our divisions: Global Finance, Corporate Treasury, Risk Management, Human Resources, Compliance, Legal, and within the Corporate Administrative Office. You’ll be part of a team specifically built to meet and exceed our evolving technology needs, as well as our technology controls agenda.

title: Staff Software Engineer
description: We areYouTrip is Southeast Asia’s 1st and leading multi-currency wallet. As a regional financial technology startup, YouTrip is dedicated to creating the best mobile financial services by simplifying foreign currency payments and offering the best exchange rates. Launched in 2018, YouTrip has been voted the #1 multi-currency account in Singapore with the largest user base in the region following its successful launch in Thailand in partnership with Karsikornbank in 2019.YouTrip is a Major Payment Institution licensed under the Monetary Authority of Singapore and awarded the Top FinTech Leaders 2020 by the Singapore FinTech Association, and ASEAN’s Best Fintech Startup 2019 by the Rice Bowl Startup Awards.Our culture is entrepreneurial, open  inclusive, and teamwork-oriented. We are looking for talents with the aspiration to thrive in a rapidly growing business in the exciting FinTech space.You Will  Demonstrate technical leadership, leading team, and set technical direction  Lead on architecting and designing software platforms and systems  Build scalable server-side applications that will constitute our core platforms and provide services to our mobile application and business partners to create a robust yet reliable highly transactional and event-driven application and infrastructure architectures  Design, create and run automated unit and integration testing for Microservices and supporting systems/infrastructure  Collaborate with cross-functional teams to define, design, and ship new features in a fast and iterative development process  Participate in all phases of development life cycle such as coding, code review, testing, and debugging  Take ownership and responsibility on the software and system you created  Mentor and train engineers and ensure best coding practiceYou Are  Passionate about technology – you have a minimum of 8 years of hands-on experience in software development, using Java, .Net, Python, or other popular languages; knowledge in Golang is a plus. You have a strong interest in working with microservices and cloud technologies.  Adaptable with a growth mindset – you want to grow and you learn by doing. You always value opportunities to improve. Obstacles and failures only motivate you to move forward.  A respectful and open team player – you are transparent about your work. You enjoy contributing to the team and you are also open to receiving and giving feedback in a respectful manner. Having experience in technical initiatives and leadership is also a great plus.  Excited about high-quality work – thoughtful and forward-thinking about system design and programming. You are resilient and you find satisfaction in overcoming challenges and solving puzzles.What We Offer  An innovative culture that encourages talents to work highly collaboratively in a respectful, friendly environment  Multi-cultural co-working space environment in CBD area  Direct report to the Head of Engineering and be part of the growth team of the Singapore business  Access to a deep bench of technical and business experts to work together  Working with an entrepreneurial team of people in Singapore, Thailand, and Hong KongTo applyIf you are interested in this position, please send your resume along with your salary expectation to hr@you.co.

title: Java Software Engineer, Payments, Associate
description: Job DescriptionAs a member of our Software Engineering Group you will dive head-first into creating innovative solutions that advance businesses and careers. You’ll join an inspiring and curious team of technologists dedicated to improving the design, analytics, development, coding, testing and application programming that goes into creating high quality software and new products. You’ll be tasked with keeping the team and other key stakeholders up to speed on the progress of what’s being developed. Coming in with an understanding of the importance of end-to-end software development-such as Agile frameworks-is key. And best of all, you’ll be working with and sharing ideas, information and innovation with our global team of technologists from all over the world.Core Transaction Services (CTS) is a technology organization responsible for transaction processing platforms globally for the Treasury Services business, with primary focus on payments and receivables.  A key agenda over the next few years is the build-out of the strategic payments platform to replace the current regional payments systems and external clearing integration.  The APAC delivery team covers the rollout of the new platform to the APAC branches.This role requires a wide variety of strengths and capabilities, including:  Candidate should possess at least a Bachelor's Degree in Computer Science, Information Systems, Engineering or related discipline  Minimum 3 years of experience in Java enterprise application development, preferably delivering high-performance, mission critical applicationsProficiency in one or more of the following technologies:  Java 8+  Spring Framework , Spring Boot  Experience with SQL databases such as Oracle  Experience with NoSQL databases such as Cassandra  Experience with messaging and pub-sub platforms such as IBM MQ and Kafka  Experience with SCM and CI tools such Bitbucket, Jenkins, Maven  Knowledge in developing microservices and RESTful APIs  Familiar with UNIX operating system and scripting  Team player who works well individually and in teams, shares information and collaborates with colleagues during execution of the project.  Enthusiastic, self-motivated, strong interest in learning, effective under pressure and willing to take personal responsibility / accountability  Strong analytical and problem solving skills  Good communication skillsFunctional Knowledge:  Knowledge of Payments processing (life cycle), Good understanding of payments data models; familiarity with the ISO20022 standard is an advantageAbout UsJ.P. Morgan is a global leader in financial services, providing strategic advice and products to the world’s most prominent corporations, governments, wealthy individuals and institutional investors. Our first-class business in a first-class way approach to serving clients drives everything we do. We strive to build trusted, long-term partnerships to help our clients achieve their business objectives.We recognize that our people are our strength and the diverse talents they bring to our global workforce are directly linked to our success. We are an equal opportunity employer and place a high value on diversity and inclusion at our company. We do not discriminate on the basis of any protected attribute, including race, religion, color, national origin, gender, sexual orientation, gender identity, gender expression, age, marital or veteran status, pregnancy or disability, or any other basis protected under applicable law. In accordance with applicable law, we make reasonable accommodations for applicants’ and employees’ religious practices and beliefs, as well as any mental health or physical disability needs.About the TeamOur Corporate  Investment Bank relies on innovators like you to build and maintain the technology that helps us safely service the world’s important corporations, governments and institutions. You'll develop solutions that help the bank provide strategic advice, raise capital, manage risk, and extend liquidity in markets spanning over 100 countries around the world.

applications built on Java technologies  Deploy systems to production and provide post-implementation support  Provide maintenance support to customers by investigating and rectifying reported systems shortcomings during/after working hours when necessary  Understand the interdependencies of the services (application, system and database) and able to pin-point problem areas accurately to improve overall efficiency  Assess opportunities for application and process improvement and prepare documentation of rationale to share with team members and other affected parties  Adhere to high-quality development principles while delivering solutions on-time  Perform other duties as assignedRequirements  Degree in Computer Science or equivalent field of study  Bilingual in English and Chinese language for business communication needs and liaise with Chinese counterparts  Experience in front-end and/or mobile application developments  Possess good experience developing web application, Web Forms and Enterprise Workflows  3+ years of experience in systems analysis, design, programming with knowledge the following technologies:  JavaScript, including DOM manipulation and the modern ECMAScript language features  Thorough understanding of React.js and its core principles and Familiarity other framework ( Angular,Vuejs)  Familiarity with basic data structure and algorithms type safe javascript or typescript  Thorough understanding of Vue.js and its core principles  Knowledge of micro-service design development
