title: 7104-Application Engineer Manager [P/L | CCTV | Security system MNC | Access Control]
description: Bugis | 5 days | 9am-6pmAttractive SalaryCareer Progression OpportunitiesInterested applicants can send your resume to supreme.cyred@gmail.com and allow our Consultants to match you with our Clients. No Charges will be incurred by Candidates for any service rendered.Job MissionReporting to the Operation Manager, APAC, the Application Engineer Manager is responsible for the day-to-day management, training and development of Application Engineers who provide support for integration or technical projects. Help manage the P/L (profit and loss) while ensuring all client and company business needs are met.Responsibilities  Attend meetings with customers and Project Management team to analyze and determine customer system needs and provide recommendations.  Understand all customer commitments / contracts/ standards and ensure that all fulfilments are met to milestones and quality standards.  Ensure new hires are trained to comply with client standards/processes.  Work with the Design and Project Management team to engineer systems. Take over-all responsibility for estimating Application Engineering tasks during projects.  Create test plans, coordinate with commissioning team and test systems.  Create and set up the server OS, database, application, and services in line with the clients requirements.  Configure the system to continue to run in an optimal state via regular archives, backups, and maintenance.  Work with the commissioning engineers/tech to fully test and bring the system online.  Customize system to customers business model.  Work in compliance with the company's Health and Safety standards and requirements with the safety of self and others in mind at all times.  Troubleshoot system / security network related issues over the phone.  Train customers and technicians on proposed and installed systems.  Document and maintain system architecture and parameters based on customer standards.  Continue to investigate new technologies that can assist our customer base and increase our productivity.  Continue higher education in management or security industry to support management role.  Attend industry tradeshows as needed and maintain a professional working relationship with manufacturers.Managerial Responsibilities  Oversee Application Engineering team, and work together with Project Management team, to ensure client needs are met with minimal scheduling conflict.  Identify and plan for future hiring needs.  Responsible for initiating and participating in the hiring efforts for the Application Engineering team by alerting HR and Director of Professional Services of open positions.  Work with Operation Manager, APAC to ensure company strategic policy and technological consistency is achieved globally.  Work with Service/Installation Manager in creating a career path for technicians into the Application Engineering group.  Mentor Application Engineers to enhance both technical  general business management skills.  Empower Application Engineering team to keep up to date with current market developments and further their continuous professional development.  Continually improve quality and efficiency within the organization.  Schedule and coordinate Application Engineers for projects.  Responsible for approving timesheets, expense reports and PTO.  Hold regular one-on-one meetings with direct reports.  Responsible for scheduling technology training as needed.  Review RFP, RFI, RFQs and provide feedback to ensure a successful proposal.  Work with various teams to develop a statement of work.  Review team-created project plans and identify deficiencies and corrective measures.Qualifications/Skills  Bachelors degree in Computer Science or direct industry experience.  Minimum of five years managing a team of five or more direct reports.  Customer-focused with strong written and verbal communications skills  Ability to efficiently manage people multiple tasks, activities, and events simultaneously  Strong interpersonal skills and proven ability to drive results in a multicultural and global environment.  Effective ability to prioritize, provide leadership and direction to others.Required Education/Experience  Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or Software Engineer or related field.  Management experience (five years)

systems.• Document and maintain system architecture and parameters based on customer standards.• Continue to investigate new technologies that can assist our customer base and increase our productivity.• Continue higher education in management or security industry to support management role.• Attend industry tradeshows as needed and maintain a professional working relationship with manufacturers.Managerial Responsibilities• Oversee Application Engineering team, and work together with Project Management team, to ensure client needs are met with minimal scheduling conflict.• Identify and plan for future hiring needs.• Responsible for initiating and participating in the hiring efforts for the Application Engineering team by alerting HR and Director of Professional Services of open positions.• Work with Operation Manager, APAC to ensure company strategic policy and technological consistency is achieved globally.• Work with Service/Installation Manager in creating a career path for technicians into the Application Engineering group.• Mentor Application Engineers to enhance both technical  general business management skills.• Empower Application Engineering team to keep up to date with current market developments and further their continuous professional development.• Continually improve quality and efficiency within the organization.• Schedule and coordinate Application Engineers for projects.• Responsible for approving timesheets, expense reports and PTO.• Hold regular one-on-one meetings with direct reports.• Responsible for scheduling technology training as needed.• Review RFP, RFI, RFQs and provide feedback to ensure a successful proposal.• Work with various teams to develop a statement of work.• Review team-created project plans and identify deficiencies and corrective measures.Qualifications/Skills• Bachelors degree in Computer Science or direct industry experience.• Minimum of five years managing a team of five or more direct reports.• Customer-focused with strong written and verbal communications skills• Ability to efficiently manage people multiple tasks, activities, and events simultaneously• Strong interpersonal skills and proven ability to drive results in a multicultural and global environment.• Effective ability to prioritize, provide leadership and direction to others.Required Education/ExperienceBachelor's degree in Computer Science or Software Engineer or related field.Management experience (five years)

title: System Engineer
description: The System Engineer is responsible for:  To provide office hour support in 1 location, and rotating offsite standby required. Occasionally will need to work during the weekend.  Assisting the Customer in the verification, isolation, and/or provision of a temporary workaround for the incident/problem logged.  Resolving the incident/problem onsite.  Escalating unsolvable problems and service requests to the System and/or Software Engineer and reporting the escalation to the Operation/Project Manager.  Generating the relevant administrative records and reports.  Introducing and integrating new technologies into existing environments.  Applying operating system updates, patches, and configuration changes.  Adding, removing, or updating user account information, resetting passwords, etc.  Answering technical queries  Maintaining the configuration of the system.  To implement Service Request and Change Request.  Contacting OEM/Vendor/subcontractor for technical support.  Focus on Windows OS patches and monitoring and resolving SCOM alerts.Requirements:  Degree/Diploma in Computer Science, Computer Engineering or equivalent, although consideration will be given to experience and certifications in lieu of degree.  Minimum 2 to 4 years of IT experience.  Minimum 3 years of experience working as a System engineer within the operations environment.  Past working experience in a Cloud environment is an advantage.  Able to handle demanding service response and recovery turnaround.  Able to manage daily support tasks to meet stringent SLA requirements.  Excellent scheduling and multitasking skills  Meticulous and process-oriented.  Good, hard-working attitude with the ability to work well under pressure.  Good communication skills (written, spoken).  Good analytical skills with the ability to work with others to resolve problems.  Good organization skills, with the ability to properly document and track information.  Preferably with Microsoft Certification and/or ITIL certification.  Dynamic, customer-oriented, experience working in a fast-paced environment.  Good Knowledge of the following products will be advantageous:  Active Directory/DNS  Microsoft SCOM  Microsoft Azure Stack  Microsoft Windows 2008-2019  Commvault Backup and Recovery  Mcafee Anti-virus  Good understanding of server, storage, and networking concept

title: QA Engineer
description: ViSenze is a fast-growing, global Retail AI solution provider trusted by the world’s leading brands and 900+ retailers globally with almost a decade of experience in AI and Computer Vision. To help us build upon our success, we are seeking a QA Engineer to play a pivotal role in driving excellence and best practices for the Quality Assurance (QA) function in ViSenze.The position reports to the Senior Software Engineer (Team Lead) and will work in close conjunction with the Product team and across multiple stakeholders within the Engineering team.Responsibilities  Design, code and implement automated frameworks and tests for web, API, dashboard applications  Be responsible for identifying bugs and communicating their business impacts to facilitate decision-making by Product Management and Engineering  Be hands-on and perform functional and UI testing of features for release cycles, which includes creating/executing test cases, raising/tracking defects etc.  Conduct system performance testings to ensure system reliability, capacity and scalability  Evangelize and promote a test-driven development cycle that incorporates QA and testing as an integral part of the planning and development process, to maintain the highest level of software quality  Write and maintain automation scripts to improve quality of deliverables and efficiency in the development release cyclesRequirements  Degree in Computer Science, Computer Engineering or related discipline  Strong experience in testing Web, API applications  Strong knowledge of tools used for test, build and release process like JUnit, TestNG, Git, Maven, Jenkins, and Jira, Docker  Hands-on and proven experience in Selenium Test Automation tool/framework  Good experience in using performance test tools (such as HP Performance Centre / WebLoad / Apache Jmeter)  Good experience with Continuous Integration tools and processesAwesome To Have  Attention to detail -- ability to uncover details and think through undocumented use cases that can break the system  Passionate about technology, enjoys a technical challenge, and programs for fun  Ability to work within a dynamic and challenging environment  Excellent customer focus and communication skills  Candidates with strong experience will be considered for a Senior positionAbout UsViSenze is a fast-growing, global Retail AI solution provider. Our AI solutions redefine how Retailers, Brands, and Marketplaces improve their businesses, both on the digital shop floor and behind the scenes. We optimize product discoverability, provide deep catalog intelligence, and drive contextually relevant ads that are proven to shorten the conversion path for consumers both online and in-store.Today, ViSenze is acknowledged by Interbrand, CBInsights, VentureBeat, Gartner, and Forrester. Also ranked as top 10 tech companies in 2019 by Glassdoor in Singapore and winner of The Best Tech Company to Work For in 2019. ViSenze offers the opportunity to join a thriving, fast-paced, multi-cultural environment and be part of a growth journey. To learn why the world’s top brands and retailers trust ViSenze, visit www.visenze.com

title: Senior Solutions Architect - Solutions Architect #SGunitedjobs
description: About usPALO IT is a global innovation consultancy specialised in human-centered design, Agile software development and in the AI-driven transformation of large, forward-thinking companies. As a community of innovators, designers and technologists, we are committed to helping businesses embrace tech as a force for good. We work with clients to rapidly launch products and services, create new business models, and prepare leadership and culture for the future.Started in Paris in 2009 and with offices across five continents, we are proud to be a B-Corp certified company in Singapore (the first tech company to do so!) and Hong Kong, and working towards certification across all other locations. To further our vision of bringing positive change to better our world, we are looking for a new team member to join our exciting team in Singapore.At PALO IT, your happiness is our success. People are the heart of our organisation and the centre of everything we do. We constantly strive to provide the best employee experience, as well as cultivate a diverse, inclusive and multicultural work environment, with many opportunities where you grow professionally and personally.Our Vision and ValuesWe aspire to positively impact the world by empowering organisations to harness the power of transformative technology for the greater good.  We care about our World  We act with Courage  We Share, it’s in our DNA  We choose Positivity  We Deliver AwesomenessYour profile  responsibilitiesYOU:Does building and delivering innovative web / mobile business solutions excite you? If you answered yes then you might be the person we're looking for!Do you also:  Thrive on tough challenges. When was the last time you failed and how did you respond?  Seek out learning opportunities. What are you up to right now?  Adapt to constant change. When were you last surprised?  Have the mastery over at least one skill of your trade but you’re not defined by it. What can you teach us? Can you wear many hats?If you answered yes to all, then this could be the start of something special.YOU AGAIN:We are offering an exciting opportunity for a Senior Software Engineer (Solution Architecture) to join our innovative, fun and dynamic team. You’ll work alongside our Tech Hive to initiate development, carry out scoping estimations, implement architecture designs and write architecture documents. You will assist our customers in adopting best practices in new architecture patterns. We are looking for someone who is passionate about new technologies and digital innovation. Ideally an individual who is resourceful, detail oriented, looking for the excitement that comes from working hard - and wants to work with a team who feels the same way. Your work will make a direct impact on to the social, environmental and purpose driven objectives and initiatives of PALO IT in order to positively impact our environment, customers, communities and ourselves as an organization and individual.YOUR RESPONSIBILITIES:  Within exciting projects, you will contribute to the creation of innovative solutions and put into practice TDD and XP in an Open Source environment.  You will have the chance to develop within high-performance software factories and actively contribute to the life of the project from ground up.  Participate to the full development lifecycle including design, estimation, planning, development, unit test, release and implementation support.  Contribute to / review the technical specifications and ensure proper traceability with detailed specifications  code.  Manage and report on technical risks on the projects.  Control and maintain the quality of development (norms  standards, frameworks, source control, technical reviews, code reviews).  Assist infrastructure teams with environment support.  Provide guidance to project team members and others.  Interview, onboard and train newcomers.YOUR PROFILE:  You are experienced with at least 5+ years of hands-on experience with various Java / web technologies and frameworks: Spring (Core, Security, MVC, Boot), JPA, REST, JMS, Maven, AngularJS, ReactJS, NodeJS etc.  Experience in playing Senior Architecture roles; i.e., Enterprise Architect, Platform/Portfolio architect and/or large-scale transformation Program Architect role.  Track record in IT security, compliance, risk management as well as hybrid cloud environments and experience in sales/product management.  Experienced in building and delivering web / mobile business solutions (e.g. in Banking, Travel, Finance, Healthcare, Information industries) and Restful API projects.  Very good knowledge of design patterns and development principles.  Proven/previous experience with Continuous Integration/Continuous Deployment and DevOps.  Designed Cloud Native Application Architectures or optimise applications for Cloud.  Perennial professional experience on Public Clouds (Azure / AWS) as Cloud Solution Architect or Engineer.  Experience in cloud strategy at C-level  Lead Independently client design workshops and deliver complex cloud-based solutions.  Help clients with business case development, application assessment, on-prem to cloud migration path planning and Cloud Operating Model design, modernisation of technology landscape.  Help clients in defining end to end architecture that helps their business improve scalability and resiliency and drive implementation efficiency.  Help to identify and document the common architectural patterns across projects  Able to guide conversations with clients and delivery teams from ideation through to deployment to ensure a rich and effective client experience  Strong critical thinker with problem solving aptitude.  General banking knowledge or Banking knowledge related to Wealth Management / Private banking is a plus.  You have already worked in an Agile environment driven by Time-To-Market  You are independent and able to make significant proposals.  Most of all, you love CODING! Share your GitHub account!Your role as PALO IT AmbassadorYou will be invited to take part in RD works done within our Practices. You will have the chance to assist or be a speaker at must-attend international IT conferences. You will have the opportunity to write articles for our Blog or specialized press. As a genuine ambassador of PALO IT, you will present our offers and take an active role in the development of the company. In addition, you will contribute to the social, environmental and purpose driven objectives and initiatives of PALO IT in order to positively impact our environment, customers, communities and ourselves as an organization and individual.If you like what you just read, we’d love to have a chat with you!We might not be able to get back to every applicant but we promise your application will be reviewed by one of our recruitment experts.Protecting your privacy and the security of your data are longstanding top priorities for Palo-IT.Your personal data will be processed for the purposes of managing Palo-IT’s recruitment related activities, which include setting up and conducting interviews and tests for applicants, evaluating and assessing the results, and as is otherwise needed in the recruitment and hiring processes.Please consult our Privacy Notice (https://www.palo-it.com/en/privacy-policy) to know more about how we collect, use, and transfer the personal data of our candidates.Here you can find how you can request for access, correction and/or withdrawal of your Personal Data.

title: Senior Backend Engineer, Visualization and Scalable Simulations
description: We are seeking a talented Backend Software Engineer to help develop, roll out, and support the next generation of our AV Stack-testing platform. Our team is responsible for building and maintaining a  scalable, full-stack compute infrastructure that is widely used in the company to schedule simulations, view results, extract meaningful metrics, and perform various ad-hoc analyses. We often deal with test requests that include thousands of simulations to be completed in minutes. Our platform is essential for  testing safety critical components of our autonomous driving stack. We help the development of a reliable AV by allowing our researchers and engineers to quickly understand how our AV systems perform under various scenarios in simulated environments.What you'll be doing:  Designing, building and maintaining our scalable compute platform for testing and validating AV stack algorithms.  Writing high quality, maintainable code  Assisting with analysis, design, and code reviews  Collaborating with global stakeholders to identify system requirements  Providing operational support for end-users in case of issuesWhat we hope you'll come with:  5+ years of professional software development experience  BS or MS in Computer Science or related field  Experience with development of RESTful services hosted on cloud infrastructure (preferably AWS, especially utilizing S3, Lamba, RDS, SQS, and RedShift)  Experience with Serverless Architectures  Experience with .NET core and C#n  Comfort working in a fast-paced, continuous delivery environmentBonus points:  Experience with Golang and/or Python  Experience with Amazon Web Services  Experience with Docker and Kubernetes  Experience with large scale compute  Experience working in cross-functional development teams  Experience with distributed systems design and architecture  Experience troubleshooting and tuning systems  Experience with relational and Nosql databases  Experience with test driven software development

title: IMDA 2022 - CIT .Net Developer
description: JOIN OUR IT TEAMS IN SINGAPORE THROUGH THE TECHNOLOGY ASSOCIATE COMPANY LED TRAINING PROGRAMMECrédit Agricole CIB’s Technology Associate Company Led Training Programme is an exciting career gateway into technology and the financial services sector. We are seeking highly motivated graduates and aspiring tech-innovators to offer an accelerated technology induction experience and fast-tracked career in the banking industry.The Information Systems Asia Pacific – (“ISAP”) in Singapore is one of the three main technology centers for Crédit Agricole CIB’s worldwide businesses and this IT hub is the key driver of Crédit Agricole’s worldwide IT strategy.The ProgrammeCrédit Agricole CIB’s 9-month Technology Associate Company Led Training (“CLT-CACIB”) Programme is supported by Singapore Info-communications Media Development Authority (IMDA). It is open to fresh graduates and postgraduate candidates who are keen in a career as Software Engineer.As a Technology Associate in this programme, you will:  Kick-start your career through a tech development course as Junior Software Engineer on investment projects using latest technologies.  Develop broad-based in-depth Tech expertise through our personalized training programme within one of our three Company Led Training learning paths within Agile Software Engineering project teams.  Work along with empowering teams across the globe on impactful projects and receive supportive mentorship from a dedicated mentor to accelerate your learning curve.  Full experiential learning with challenging responsibilities and rewarding career development as you make valuable contributions to Crédit Agricole CIB's success.Application  Selection Process  Apply Online   Psychometrics Assessment  Interview  Technology Associate Company Led Training ProgrammeAs part of the application process, please apply via this link:https://app.jobvite.com/j?cj=oAZCgfwbs=URLJunior .Net developer-CORPORATE IT DEPARTMENTCorporate IT DepartmentThe Corporate IT (CIT) team is supported by its four main functions to ensure a compliant and secure delivery of its internal banking operations, data analytics reporting as well as the key delivery of innovative applications across CA-CIB’s international network.Tapping on emerging IT solutions, we are heavily investing in automated development and testing and collaborative design processes. Using lean methodologies to provide quality business value and route-to-market efficiency, the CA-CIB’s CIT team is connected by intertwining cultures of diverse backgrounds, boasting a team of 120 Finance  Tech change-makers – consisting of tech leads, project managers, business analysts, data experts and developers from all walks of life.Main Responsibilities  Duties  Interact closely with creative project teams for the development of responsive apps using .Net, .Net Core  other front end frameworks (Bootstrap, ReactJS, JQuery...)  Work alongside senior devs and leads to contribute in architecture / design discussions, participate in system impact analysis and effort estimations.  Translate design ideas into clean and reliable code that is easy to comprehend  Strong MS-SQL development (currently SQL Server 2016  SQL Server 2019)  Enjoy problem solving - Ensuring an "efficient support  maintenance" of applications in production - analyze and resolve issues as they arise, improve  refactor!  Strong accountability  ownership with an ability to deliver the highest quality of work meeting business requirements.If you are looking for a career where you can grow and meet the following criteria, talk to us about building your career at CA-CIB.Qualifications  A Bachelor’s or Postgraduate degree from a recognized university.  0 - 3 yrs of work experience in MS-SQL development and Microsoft technologies.  Exceptional analytical abilities, critical thinking and problem–solving aptitude, intellectual curiosity and interest in finding new ways to do things  A global mindset combined with strong written and verbal communication skills in English language.  Self-starter with outstanding qualities such as leadership, resilience, adaptability, integrity, strong organizational skills and the ability to work well with a diverse group of people, as shown in your participation in varsity, extracurricular, social activities.As part of the application process, please apply via this link:https://app.jobvite.com/j?cj=oAZCgfwbs=URL

title: Software Developer (iOS/Android)
description: Wong Fong is looking for an enthusiastic individual who will join us on a journey to build a wide range of mobile apps for various industries. You will be part of a talented team that are passionate about coding and learning new Cloud technologies. You will also get to be involved with many of our in-house mobile apps which are critical to our operational flow. As part of the Smart Nation initiatives, we are creating products that will link up machinery equipment to cloud technologies which you will be involved in coming up with new software solutions. As a software engineer, it will be your responsibility to pick up new software technologies that will help the company improve existing or create new products.Responsibilities:· Build and maintain new/existing mobile apps for inter-department and commercial usage.· Come up with solutions that will help improve existing processes and improve overall productivity.· Be involved in our Internet-Of-Things (IoT) team discussion to come up with solutions that will link up machinery equipment through cloud technologies.Requirements:· Strong programming skills such as C, C++, Objective-C and Java.· Have past experience of making mobile apps for either iOS or Android.· Experience with AWS cloud services.

title: Business Solutions Manager
description: Your job.Zuhlke is at an incredible time of growth. Having seen 50 years of success in Europe, Zuhlke made the leap to open up its first inter-continental offices in Asia with the vision to bring and establish its reputation for high-quality software development solutions. The Business Solution Manager is a critical role in ensuring Zuhlke thrives here in the Singapore market and it requires someone who is highly organized and adaptable, enjoys both strategy and delivery/execution, and all the while remains dedicated to the best interests of the team and the clients.As the Business Solution Manager, you are responsible for the success of our client projects. You are a key partner for our clients as you dig deep into understanding what their challenges are before mapping out great solutions that will ultimately have them win. You are skilled in managing multiple different parties  interests as you will be at the center between the client (who wants successful project delivery), our business development team (who wants financial success for Zuhlke), and our software engineers (who wants interesting, challenging projects to work on). You are therefore flexible in being able to work with a variety of people to ensure that project delivery is up to our high standards at Zuhlke while ensuring that our team remains engaged and happy in their projects.Ultimately, you play a large part in the success of our Singapore office. You ensure that customer satisfaction is extremely high and that growth  profitability goals are being met, and you accomplish this by jumping in to assist and tackle anything and everything necessary. You are naturally entrepreneurial and thus a multi-faceted role like this is perfectly suited to your strengths.Your Talent.  You have 8+ years of experience working within software development projects on both the project management side and as a software engineer.  You have strong experience in being client-facing and have worked in account management roles. Your past experience also demonstrates a track record for strong project delivery.  You are exceptional in your ability to quickly develop strong, trusted relationships. You are highly skilled in adapting your communication style and you are genuinely interested and curious about our customers and their needs.  You have a demonstrated strength in being able to quickly understand complex business problems and find solutions to them.  You have a unique ability to be able to think high-level and build out strategies, while also possessing the humbleness to do whatever is necessary to have the greater team be successful.  You hold strong leadership experience and values. You are seen as a role model who inspires confidence and empowers their team to do stunning work that they are proud of.  You have a strong understanding of the local market and landscape, and you are great at balancing professionalism with warmth and genuineness.  You hold a university degree, preferably in the business and technology field. You also have an attitude of continuous learning and are regularly taking personal initiative to further develop your skills.

title: Mobile Application Developer (Android) – Contract | Banking

Should have the ability to configure a continuous integration/deployment working environment and Gradle  Experience of integrating with Kony Middleware (Mobile fabric) is required but not mandatory  Experience in working with Financial / Banking applications.  Accountable for the production of high-quality code on a personal level adhering to all software engineer quality standards / benchmark.  End to end software development life cycle.  Agile software development techniques.  Test driven development and knowledge testing automation / Unit testing.  Knowledge of Object-oriented programming and Design concepts.  Knowledge in MVVM design patterns.  Experience in Android studio, Android SDK, Java.  Knowledge in Web service REST / SOAP.  Experience in Gradle build system.  Introduction to Android debug tools such as DDMS, ADB, TraceView, Hierarchy viewer etc.  Introduction Android UI design patterns and best practices.Interested candidates may send in their resume and cover letter directly to gem.cabria@manpower.com.sgJireli Gem Mejia Cabria | EA License No. 02C3423 | Personnel Registration No. R1434374Please note that your response to this advertisement and communications with us pursuant to this advertisement will constitute informed consent to the collection, use and/or disclosure of personal data by ManpowerGroup Singapore for the purpose of carrying out its business, in compliance with the relevant provisions of the Personal Data Protection Act 2012. title: Opening for Frontend Developer
description: Greetings from Alpsoft Technologies!!We are seeking a highly motivated software engineer who will write beautiful code, and contribute in delivering the next generation national health claims processing platform. title: Machine Learning Engineer
description: Coinbase has built the world's leading compliant cryptocurrency platform serving over 68 million accounts in more than 100 countries. With multiple successful products, and our vocal advocacy for blockchain technology, we have played a major part in mainstream awareness and adoption of cryptocurrency. We are proud to offer an entire suite of products that are helping build the cryptoeconomy and increase economic freedom around the world.There are a few things we look for across all hires we make at Coinbase, regardless of role or team. First, we look for signals that a candidate will thrive in a culture like ours, where we default to trust, embrace feedback, disrupt ourselves, and expect sustained high performance because we play as a championship team. Second, we expect all employees to commit to our mission-focused approach to our work. Finally, we seek people with the desire and capacity to build and share expertise in the frontier technologies of crypto and blockchain, in whatever way is most relevant to their role.As a Senior Machine Learning Engineer you’ll be building the critical infrastructure for the open financial system - tapping into a variety of large data sources such as the blockchain - to provide millions of people access to crypto while detecting and preventing bad actors. You’ll not only have the chance to drive significant impact from protecting Coinbase, you’ll also leverage machine learning to make our product delightful by adding intelligence to news, notifications, risk, and much more.What you’ll be doing (ie. job duties):  Build onboarding codelabs, tools and infrastructure for ML to democratize access to ML across Coinbase.  Explore and leverage state of the art machine learning techniques for a variety of problems across the company including fraud, feed ranking, recommendations and targeting, blockchain mining.  Build and launch excellent productionalized, low-maintenance applied Machine Learning integrations.What we look for in you (ie. job requirements):  3+yrs of industry experience as a machine learning and software engineer  Experience building backend systems at scale with a focus on data processing/machine learning/analytics.  Experience with at least one ML model: Logistic Regression, Gradient Boosting trees, Deep learning, etc.  Working knowledge in one or more of the following: data mining, information retrieval, advanced statistics or natural language processing, computer vision.  Exhibit our core cultural values: add positive energy, communicate clearly, be curious, and be a builder.Nice to haves:  BS, MS, PhD degree in Computer Science, Machine Learning, Data Mining, Statistics, or related technical field.  Knowledge of Apache Airflow, Spark, Flink, Kafka/Kinesis, Snowflake, Hadoop, Hive.  Experience with Python.  Experience with model interpretability, responsible AI.  Experience with data analysis and visualization.

title: 7104-Application Engineer Manager [ manage P/L / Train staffs/ Troubleshoot system]
description: Central – Singapore  Attractive Salary Package  5 days, Mon-Fri ; 9am - 6pm  Company Benefits  Incentives  Career Progression Opportunities!Responsibilities  Attend meetings with customers and Project Management team to analyze and determine customer system needs and provide recommendations.  Understand all customer commitments / contracts/ standards and ensure that all fulfilments are met to milestones and quality standards.  Ensure new hires are trained to comply with client standards/processes.  Work with the Design and Project Management team to engineer systems. Take over-all responsibility for estimating Application Engineering tasks during projects.  Create test plans, coordinate with commissioning team and test systems.  Create and set up the server OS, database, application, and services in line with the clients requirements.  Configure the system to continue to run in an optimal state via regular archives, backups, and maintenance.  Work with the commissioning engineers/tech to fully test and bring the system online.  Customize system to customers business model.  Work in compliance with the company's Health and Safety standards and requirements with the safety of self and others in mind at all times.  Troubleshoot system / security network related issues over the phone.  Train customers and technicians on proposed and installed systems.  Document and maintain system architecture and parameters based on customer standards.  Continue to investigate new technologies that can assist our customer base and increase our productivity.  Continue higher education in management or security industry to support management role.  Attend industry tradeshows as needed and maintain a professional working relationship with manufacturers.Managerial Responsibilities :  Oversee Application Engineering team, and work together with Project Management team, to ensure client needs are met with minimal scheduling conflict.  Identify and plan for future hiring needs.  Responsible for initiating and participating in the hiring efforts for the Application Engineering team by alerting HR and Director of Professional Services of open positions.  Work with Operation Manager, APAC to ensure company strategic policy and technological consistency is achieved globally.  Work with Service/Installation Manager in creating a career path for technicians into the Application Engineering group.  Mentor Application Engineers to enhance both technical  general business management skills.  Empower Application Engineering team to keep up to date with current market developments and further their continuous professional development.  Continually improve quality and efficiency within the organization.  Schedule and coordinate Application Engineers for projects.  Responsible for approving timesheets, expense reports and PTO.  Hold regular one-on-one meetings with direct reports.  Responsible for scheduling technology training as needed.  Review RFP, RFI, RFQs and provide feedback to ensure a successful proposal.  Work with various teams to develop a statement of work.  Review team-created project plans and identify deficiencies and corrective measures.Qualifications/Skills : -  Bachelors degree in Computer Science or direct industry experience.  Minimum of five years managing a team of five or more direct reports.  Customer-focused with strong written and verbal communications skills  Ability to efficiently manage people multiple tasks, activities, and events simultaneously  Strong interpersonal skills and proven ability to drive results in a multicultural and global environment.  Effective ability to prioritize, provide leadership and direction to others.  Required Education/Experience  Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or Software Engineer or related field.  Management experience (five years)

title: SRE Engineer
description: ViSenze is a fast-growing, global Retail AI solution provider trusted by the world’s leading brands and 900+ retailers globally with almost a decade of experience in AI and Computer Vision. To help us build upon our success, we seek a dynamic, driven, and results-orientated SRE Engineer, to improve our production reliability and engineering efficiency.The position reports to the Senior Software Engineer (API Team Lead) and will work in close conjunction with the Site Reliability Engineering Team, DevOps Team and other Engineering Teams.Responsibilities  Ensure high availability and reliability of our services with large volume and transactions  Troubleshoot priority incidents, facilitate blameless postmortems and ensure permanent closure of incidents  Build CI/CD to improve development and deployment efficiency  Maintain and improve our production infrastructures with new technologiesRequirements  Bachelor’s Degree and/or Master’s Degree in Computer Science or a related technical field, or with equivalent experience  Experience with Linux Operating System, including kernel, network, memory, process, threads  Good with at least one scripting language such as Python, Shell  Experience with creating and maintaining documentations for best practices and knowledge transfer  Experience with container and orchestration ecosystem such as Docker, Kubernetes  Strong analytical and problem-solving skills with the ability to thrive under difficult and stressful situationsAwesome to have  Familiar with Kubernetes  Familiar with AWS services, such as EC2, S3, VPC, EKS, etc  Familiar with infrastructure as code and related tools, such as Terraform.  Familiar with CI/CD and related tools, such as Jenkins, Spinnaker, etc.  Coding experience beyond simple scripts* We are open to candidates from Singapore and candidates based remotely.About UsViSenze is a fast-growing, global Retail AI solution provider. Our AI solutions redefine how Retailers, Brands, and Marketplaces improve their businesses, both on the digital shop floor and behind the scenes. We optimize product discoverability, provide deep catalog intelligence, and drive contextually relevant ads that are proven to shorten the conversion path for consumers both online and in-store.Today, ViSenze is acknowledged by Interbrand, CBInsights, VentureBeat, Gartner, and Forrester. Also ranked as top 10 tech companies in 2019 by Glassdoor in Singapore and winner of The Best Tech Company to Work For in 2019. ViSenze offers the opportunity to join a thriving, fast-paced, multi-cultural environment and be part of a growth journey. To learn why the world’s top brands and retailers trust ViSenze, visit www.visenze.com

title: Principal Engineer
description: Join Affinidi and be part of the future of identity: secure, portable and controlled by the individual.Affinidi empowers individuals and organisations with ownership and control of their verifiable data, to unlock value across borders and platforms.Leveraging on the building blocks that Affinidi provides, trusted institutions and entities can issue verifiable credentials to customers, which can in turn be shared with other applications to access services in an open and interoperable ecosystem.Currently undergoing development are three applications that leverage Affinidi’s technology: Safe Travel initiative, a digital medical credentials ecosystem to safely open up international air travel; Trustana, a curated B2B marketplace and trade platform connecting verifiable, international partners for seamless cross-border trade; and Good Worker, an online job matching platform for seasonal workers and employers in India.Affinidi, along with the applications Trustana and Good Worker, are seeded by Temasek, a global investment company headquartered in Singapore.We are building a motivated and entrepreneurial team who is passionate about identity, decentralization and technology to make this happen.What you'll do  Research web 3 solutions that are of strategic importance to Affinidi  Develop technology RD roadmap and provide technical direction for the RD team  Design and build prototype web 3 solutions that can be taken forward to production  Document findings from RD exercises  Present findings to Affinidi’s management team  Provide technical mentorship to Affinidi’s RD team and Affinidi’s wider teamYou should apply if:  You have 7+ years experience as a software engineer, technical consultant, Solutions engineer, platform architect.  You are experienced in communicating with technical and business audiences  You have knowledge and experience in the web 3 technology stack  You are proficient in technical understanding of decentralized/SSI protocols and interactions within the decentralized/SSI ecosystem  You have a good understanding of the web 2 technology stack (distributed systems, TCP/IP, HTTP, JavaScript, RESTful APIs)  You have experience working with distributed, cross-functional teamsBonus points if  Have built Applications/Solutions on decentralized compute, storage, messaging protocols and frameworks  You have experience with Terraform or Pulumi and have worked with complex stacks/configurations and have experience with scaling the usage of these tools  You have experience prototyping/building/integrating DApps and have built applications on top of decentralized compute/storage/messaging layers like Dfinity, Filecoin, Storj, Ethereum, Polkadot Substrate or similar or have created applications that are integrated with decentralized protocols

title: Backend Engineer Intern (Cloud Data Warehouse)-2022
description: About Data Platform TeamThe Data Platform team builds cutting-edge Data Systems, providing productivity tools and implementation methodologies to solve EB-level data problems across the data lifecycle. The Data Platform team also empowers business growth with data, serving viral Apps across the company. Working in the Data Platform team means you have the opportunity to support almost all of the business lines in the company. With our EB-level of data complexity, the technical challenges would be something you have rarely seen and your potential growth would be exponential! We are looking for talented individuals to join us - people who want to inspire creativity and co-create the future with us.Responsibilities  As a software engineer, you will work on ByteDance's large scale services, products, and systems, which are growing rapidly;  Work in a global and flat organization, your contribution will either impact hundreds of millions of users or improve the efficiency of thousands of businesses, worldwide;  Iteratively design, develop, test, deploy, maintain and improve services and systems, which are crucial, to meet the needs of users or customers.Qualifications  Undergraduate, or Postgraduate who is currently pursuing a degree in Computer Science, related engineering discipline, or equivalent practical experience;  Software development experience in one or more general-purpose programming languages, such as Java/Go/C++/C#/Python;  Excellent proficiency in backend server development and expertise in relational databases;  Strong analytical thinking and exceptional attention to detail;  Working proficiency in verbal and written English.

title: Full Stack Engineer (NFTs, Crypto, Blockchain)
description: Company DescriptionMintable is made up of experienced professionals who are committed to building a meaningful marketplace service for NFTs. We're a dynamic, agile and gritty team that only has one goal in mind: make Mintable the best place on the internet to mint anything!Job DescriptionAre you ready to join the team? We're hiring an experienced Full Stack Software Engineer with exceptional programming skills as our team is expanding rapidly. Reporting to the CEO/CTO, you will be a key member of the Tech team where you will handle front end and application logic development. This role will contribute enormously to the success of the Tech Team and is an excellent opportunity to join an exciting industry with other focused, talented professionals. Working in collaboration with CEO/CTO and Tech Team, you will:  Work across the full stack, alongside with a multi-disciplinary team including front end engineers, UX/UI designers, product managers and CTO to build highly scalable solutions that enable positive user experience and measurable business growth.  Develop new features and infrastructure development in support of rapidly emerging business and project requirements.  Actively participate in all aspects of agile software development including design, implementation and deployment, adhering to best practices and pursing continued learning opportunities.  Strike a balance between functional and aesthetic design.  Maintain brand consistency throughout the design and build reusable code for future use.  Keep abreast of latest and emerging technologies in the blockchain and technology spaceQualificationsTo succeed in this role, we'll love for you to have:  Interest or experience in NFTs and blockchain  2 years experience managing and scaling AWS applications is a must  At least 2 years experience with at least two of the following programing languages/libraries (Reactjs, Redux, Typescript, CSS, Webpack, and Node.js)  Experience working on fullstack development and running a large production environment/application  Strong communication skills to work collaborative together with the team  A passion for learning as everyday's a new opportunity to grow and develop your skillsAdditional InformationWhat we can offer you @ Mintable?  Competitive Compensation Package  21 Days of Annual Leave  Discretionary Bonus  Comprehensive Health Insurance  Hybrid working  Challenging work in a fun and collaborative environment  Assurance of being backed by international investors  Long-term prospects for a professional career in a high growth company and up-and-coming industry  Room to fail and learn from mistakes - we love failing differently and learning!  Flexible work culture  Frequent team lunches and company events  Cozy, pet-friendly shophouse working environment in a centrally located office  Referral bonuses

title: Senior Backend Engineer - Fintech
description: foodpanda (small ‘f’) is the world’s favourite way to order food online from the comfort of your home or office. Whether it’s getting your hands on your favourite pasta, kebab or pizza, we believe that no one should have to suffer from hunger attacks ever again.However, this doesn’t happen without some really awesome people. We are looking for a Senior Software Engineer to support our growing regional engineering team that is based in Singapore. You will be part of an international team of highly talented and motivated people.What’s on the menu:  Design and implement the platform and features which will be used across Partnerships on foodpanda.  Manage project priorities, deadlines and deliverables within autonomous teams.  Work in a cross-functional and international team to deliver a holistic solution. title: AVP, Data Engineer, Group Consumer Banking and Big Data Analytics Technology, Technology & Operations (2100009H)
description: Business FunctionGroup Technology and Operations (TO) enables and empowers the bank with an efficient, nimble and resilient infrastructure through a strategic focus on productivity, quality  control, technology, people capability and innovation. In Group TO, we manage the majority of the Bank's operational processes and inspire to delight our business partners through our multiple banking delivery channels.Responsibilities  Design and build from scratch for enterprise observability infrastructure  Create and maintain optimal data pipeline.  Assemble large, complex data sets that meet functional / non-functional business requirements.  Identify, design, and implement internal process improvements: automating manual processes, optimizing data delivery, re-designing Jobs/code for greater scalability, etc.  Work with stakeholders including the Product owner, Data and Design teams to assist with data-related technical issues and support their data infrastructure needs.  Work with data and analytics experts to strive for greater functionality in our data systems.Requirements  Working SQL knowledge and experience working with RDBMS, NoSQL DB and Time-Series Database  Experience with Kubernetes and Python programming language  Experience building and optimizing ‘big data’ data pipelines, Jobs and data sets.  Experience performing root cause analysis on internal and external data and processes to answer specific business questions and identify opportunities for improvement.  Strong analytic skills related to working with structured and unstructured datasets.  Build processes supporting data transformation, data structures, metadata, dependency and workload management.  A successful history of manipulating, processing and extracting value from large datasets.  Working knowledge of message queuing, stream processing, and highly scalable ‘big data’ data stores.  Experience supporting and working with cross-functional teams in a dynamic environment.  We are looking for a candidate with 5+ years of experience in a Data or Software Engineer role, who has attained a Graduate degree in Computer Science, Statistics, Informatics, Information Systems or another quantitative field. They should also have experience using the following software/tools:  ELK, Kafka  Grafana  Relational SQL and Time-Series databases, such as MariaDB and InfluxDB  Data pipeline and workflow management tools: Airflow, Nifi, etc.  Stream-processing systems: Spark-Streaming, Flink etc.Apply NowWe offer a competitive salary and benefits package and the professional advantages of a dynamic environment that supports your development and recognises your achievements.

title: Developer
description: Want to be part of the fastest growing startup that is at the intersection of Retail, Fintech and Data?Qashier is looking for an amazing Backend Engineer to support our growth!We are a dynamic and fast growing team that is excited about commerce, retail and payments, and the opportunity to transform these industries with data and technology.We are looking for a passionate individual to join us as a Back End Developer, and preferably with some front end skills as well. As our software engineer, you are experienced in building database frameworks using scalable technology, and are someone who can implement elegant architecture solutions as well as build robust services and clean interfaces around them. You will be responsible for the development of server-side logic, definition, maintenance of database, ensuring high performance and responsiveness to requests from the front-end.What you should bring along  Qualifications in Computer Science/Engineering, similar technical field of study or relevant practical experience  Experience working two or more from the following: Firebase, GCP, NodeJS, TypeScript, Vue, HTML/CSS/JS  Good to have: React, angular, svelte or any other modern frontend frameworks  Passionate about technology, payments and the retail spaceWhy join Qashier?  Be at the forefront of a fast-growing startup in an exciting sector. Qashier’s innovative platform combines the latest developments in Cloud technology, Payments and Data to transform the Retail, FB and Beauty industries. You’ll play a crucial role on the growth of a revolutionary product that will become a key platform behind successful retail businesses in the region.  Amazing growth and learning opportunities. We are a tight knit team where everyone grows together. We’ll continuously work with you to refine your strengths and strengthen your weaknesses to further your personal and career development.  Make a strong impact with your work. You’ll be working with hundreds of small businesses across the region where the work that you do will make a direct impact to the success of these businesses.ABOUT QASHIERQashier (qashier.com) is a venture-backed startup that provides smart point-of-sale (POS) solutions that help merchants digitise their businesses. We are transforming the way retail operations and payments is done. Our flagship product is the Qashier Smart Terminal, a connected, multi-purpose device that combines a cloud-based POS software, integrated payment acceptance and a proprietary app store in one uniquely designed device. Manage entire stores (and businesses) with just one sleek terminal on the counter!

title: Full Stack Engineer (NFTs, Crypto, Blockchain)
description: Mintable is made up of experienced professionals who are committed to building a meaningful marketplace service for NFTs. We're a dynamic, agile and gritty team that only has one goal in mind: make Mintable the best place on the internet to mint anything!Job DescriptionAre you ready to join the team? We're hiring an experienced Full Stack Software Engineer with exceptional programming skills as our team is expanding rapidly. Reporting to the CEO/CTO, you will be a key member of the Tech team where you will handle front end and application logic development. Actively participate in all aspects of agile software development including design, implementation and deployment, adhering to best practices and pursing continued learning opportunities.  Strike a balance between functional and aesthetic design.  Maintain brand consistency throughout the design and build reusable code for future use. title: Application Developer (Java, TDD)
description: Accenture is an Irish-domiciled multinational professional services company that provides services in:1) Technology2) Strategy  Consulting3) Interactive4) OperationsAs a Fortune Global 500 company, it has been incorporated in Dublin, Ireland since September 1, 2009.With more than 500,000 employees worldwide—in 200 cities across 51 countries—Accenture also operates more than 100 “innovation hubs,” developing solutions for cloud, finance, and other industries.The PillarAccenture Technology combines business and industry insights with innovative technology services to transform your business. Join one of the world’s largest independent providers of technology services to grow your expertise and help clients worldwide to innovate at scale and transform their businesses. Help change how the world works and lives through technology innovation.The GroupAccenture Cloud First is a new multi-service group of 70,000 cloud professionals that brings together the full power and breadth of Accenture’s industry and technology capabilities, ecosystem partnerships, and deep commitment to learning and upskilling clients’ employees and to responsible business, with the singular focus of enabling organizations to move to the cloud with greater speed and achieve greater value for all their stakeholders at this critical time. Specifically, this new group integrates the company’s wide-ranging cloud expertise, including:  Software Development, Cloud migration, infrastructure, and application services and ecosystem partnerships; deep industry and cross-industry insights, data and Applied Intelligence capabilitiesThe RoleJava Developer/Software Engineer (Analyst – Specialist) Critical Success FactorsMandatory  5+ years Java server-side development experience with decent understanding of core design patterns.  Hands on experience in Java 8 and aboveGood to have  Knowledge of GIT, branching strategies, build and deployment pipelines  Experience of Agile/Scrum development methodologies  Experience with SQL and NoSQL Databases  Knowledge of software best practices, like Test-Driven Development (TDD) and Continuous Integration (CI)  Knowledge of consuming and providing REST APIs  Knowledge of Kubernetes  Knowledge of API gateways  Knowledge of OAuth is plus  Experience of Scala and SPARK is a plus  Knowledge of retail banking is a plus  Cloud knowledge a big plus (AWS/GCP/terraform)Responsibilities include but are not limited to:  Be a SME for Java spring boot and advise stakeholders for business requirements  Mentor and coach junior developers  Hands-on coding, develop high quality code while meeting deadlines  Design and occasional implementation of POCs  Provide unit testing and load testing  Working in highly collaborative, fun loving team using Agile methodology  Creating challenging application using Java from ground-upAll of our consulting professionals receive comprehensive training covering business acumen, technical and professional skills development. The sheer variety of work we do, and the experience it offers, provide an unbeatable platform from which to build a career.Accenture is an equal opportunities employer and welcomes applications from all sections of society and does not discriminate on grounds of race, religion or belief, ethnic or national origin, disability, age, citizenship, marital, domestic or civil partnership status, sexual orientation, gender identity, or any other basis as protected by applicable law.

title: TECH LEAD (WEB DEVELOPMENT)
description: We are looking for an innovative Tech Lead to join our company. As the Tech Lead, you will oversee the company’s team of web developers and all projects they undertake, analyse briefs, write and present progress reports, identify risks, and develop work schedules. You will be responsible for leading your team to develop digital solutions and produce associated designs to enable successful delivery of projects. You should be able to work with your team and inspire them to reach their goals.To be successful as a Tech Lead, you should be a software engineer who possess strong skills in providing technical directions involving technical vision, resolving technical challenges and managing the technical quality of your team’s deliverables. You will be required to take a hands-on approach for this job which will require you to perform the following:“What” – Your knowledge of the project’s business logic, and be able to quickly correlate that to the end goals of the digital products the company is intending to build.“How” – Identifying the best technical solutions , engaging the best vendors to derive at the best solution to achieve the company’s end goals.An outstanding Project Tech Lead is able to quickly identify problems, accountable, trustworthy, and able to build lasting relationships with their team.Roles  Responsibilities  Determining project      requirements and developing work schedules for the team.  Delegating tasks and      achieving daily, weekly, and monthly goals.  Maintaining      a productive working environment for development teams  Liaising with team members,      management, and clients to ensure projects are completed to standard.  Establishing      and/or co-ordinating programmes of work (delivered through development)  Identifying risks and      forming contingency plans as soon as possible.  Analyzing existing      operations and scheduling training sessions and meetings to discuss      improvements.  Keeping up-to-date with      industry trends and developments.  Updating work schedules and      performing troubleshooting as required.  Recruiting      and retention to meet team or IT headcount  Acquiring      appropriate budget for development to support business goals  Motivating staff and      creating a space where they can ask questions and voice their concerns.  Being transparent with the      team about challenges, failures, and successes.  Writing/Presenting progress      reports and delivering presentations to the relevant stakeholders.  Representing      the technology perspective on a management or board levelRequirementsDevelopment – A Tech Lead must have a background as a developer. They need to know how to write code and what good quality code looks like. They should be able to help their team with any technical challenges they have, even when they are not necessarily the expert.Architecture – Development is only one part of building a working system. Tech Leads must have a broader understanding of how software fits into the overall system. They need a good understanding about how software will be deployed, managed and operated in a production environment.Leadership – An effective Tech Lead needs to have strong leadership skills, even when they are not accountable for line management. Leadership skills like coaching, influencing and delegation are keys to success.  Masters or Bachelor’s      degree in computer science, or a related field.  Relevant Management      certification or experience required.  Experience in a similar      role would be advantageous.  Excellent technical,      diagnostic, and troubleshooting skills.  Strong leadership and      organizational abilities.  Willingness to build      professional relationships with staff and clients.  Excellent communication,      motivational, and interpersonal skills.Salary Range: 4,000 to 7,500

title: Site Reliability Engineer, Recommendation Architecture Team
description: About The TeamOur Recommendation Architecture Team is responsible for building up and optimizing the architecture for our recommendation system to provide the most stable and best experience for our TikTok users.  On the SRE team of Recommendation Architecture, you'll have the opportunity to sharpen your expertise in coding, performance analysis, large-scale system operation, and get heavily involved in the process of hardware/capacity decision-making.  SRE ensures that the recommendation services at ByteDance have the highest level of availability, as well as creating highly automated systems and pipelines.Responsibilities1. Reliability and operation optimization for large-scale clusters of TikTok Recommendation System.2. Continuous integration and delivery of core services, optimizing the efficiency and automation of operation, and improving service stability and RD efficiency.3. Cloud platformization, resource optimization and SLA guarantee for large-scale clusters.4. Collaboration with software engineer to design and implement DevOps solutions to Improve the efficiency of the entire RD process.Qualifications1. Operation experience of large-scale systems, familiar with system operation skills on Linux and network.2. Good programming experience with at least one of the following languages: Shell/Python/Perl/Go/C++.3. Expertise in analyzing, and troubleshooting large-scale distributed systems.

title: Security Engineer, Product Security
description: Founded in 2012, ByteDance is a technology company operating a range of global content platforms of creation and interaction, including TikTok, Douyin, Toutiao, Resso and Huoshan. ByteDance now has a portfolio of applications available in over 150 markets and 75 languages.We are committed to building a safe and user-friendly online environment for all our users, and we are looking for talented engineers and technical program managers to join our Product Security Team to support that mission and help us connect, inform, educate, entertain, and inspire.The Product Security Team at ByteDance is missioned to build infrastructures, platforms and technologies, as well as to support cross-functional teams to protect our users, products and infrastructures. In this team, you'll have a unique opportunity to have first-hand exposure to the strategy of the company in key security initiatives, especially in building scalable and secure-by-design systems and solutions. Our challenges are not your regular day-to-day technical problems; you'll be part of a team that's developing new solutions to new challenges of a kind not previously addressed by big tech. It's working fast, at scale, and we're making a difference.Responsibilities  Continuously conduct penetration testing to identify security vulnerabilities in the staging/production environment.  To understand the key features and functionalities of various products in the company.  To coordinate and make arrangements for security assessments with various product teams.  To identify risks and actively take ownership to resolve any potential project issues.  Conduct technical security review for any new products and feature requirements.  Bring insight into all aspects of modern security issues to our products and rapidly developing prototypes for mitigations.  Provide safety engineering support to product teams to help identify potential security flaws in early stages of SDLC.  Collaborate closely with other parts of the security team and product teams to design defense-in-depth controls that limit attackers' ability and improve our security postures.  Monitor and analyze emerging cyber threats, vulnerabilities, and exploits relevant to our infrastructure and products.Qualifications  BS/MS Degree in Computer Science, Software Engineer, or a related field.  Good knowledge and understanding in various disciplines: web application security, mobile app security, network security, operating system internals and hardening, applied cryptography, cloud computing. You're expected to have advanced knowledge in at least one of these areas.  Solid experience in writing and reviewing code in at least one of the following programming languages: JavaScript (Node JS), Go, Python, Java, C++, Rust.  Strong analytical and evaluative thinking of security related problems.  Good project management skills and focused teamwork.Preferred:  Experience in working with enterprise systems and SDLC-Security processes are preferred.  Ability to take challenges, work independently or as a team, and be self-driven to learn new technologies.

title: Data Analyst
description: Care is on a mission to create a world where healthcare is patient-centered, seamless, and accessible anywhere.We are in a strategic partnership with our sister company, Raffles Medical Group, to provide 100+ medical services digitally in 14 cities and more.Today, our app is used at the frontlines of COVID19 to support doctors through telemedicine, vaccine passports, and test certificates. As the digital natives of today become the aging population of tomorrow, we hope to use this momentum to build a health "superapp" that makes healthcare and insurance seamless.We are an engineer-led company that seeks clean code, uptime, and product-market fit. Come join us, and bring your talents to solve the biggest problems in the world today.You will be playing a critical role as a Software Engineer to maintain and secure deployments, in both the international and Chinese internet ecosystems.What you will be doing:  "Data Collection": Architect the data collection from mobile and web analytics (i.e. events, tools to use, instrumentation)  "Data Analytics Stack": Work with Engineers to create "data analytics" stack (data pipelines, warehouse, analytics tools)  "Data Pipelines": Work with Data Engineers to set up data pipeline from MongoDB, SQL, payment processor, and mobile and web analytics  "Product Analytics": Work with Product Managers to architect and maintain analytics for conversion funnels  "Business Intelligence Dashboards": Work with Management to manage Business Intelligence, including real-time and daily dashboards  "Business Strategy": Work with Management to parse through the data to understand the best path for the businessWhat we are looking for:  2-4 years relevant work experience in BI, data analytics in a Consumer Mobile space  Familiarity with instrumenting data collection from mobile / web platforms (i.e. Amplitude, GA, CleverTap etc)  Familiarity with data analytics tools (e.g. Metabase, Qlik, Tableau etc)  Strong understanding of SQL  NoSQLThe Ideal Candidate  Interested to work in a startup environment and comfortable with rapid iteration of products.  Have a deep interest in healthcare and enabling the next billion people to stay healthy  Critical thinking and problem-solving experienceOur Culture  We are a high-productivity culture achieved through ruthless prioritization and focus  We spend on tools to allow each employee to operate at the highest productivity  We are interested to build tools to help us live our healthiest livesPlease note that only shortlisted candidate will be notified.

title: Senior Solutions Engineer
description: Role and responsibilities  Work in improving the integration experience for banks in relation to documentation, public and private APIs, SDKs, examples, code samples and reference implementations.  Working closely with the sales team to create materials and attend meetings in order to get new partnerships over the line into implementation.  Improving internal processes to increase the team’s capacity to deliver multiple integrations in parallel.  When required, implementing new features across Wise services and exposing them on our public API. In addition, working to define new delivery mechanisms for the product, for example marketplace solutions, middleware integrations and out-of-the-box solutions.  Identify, troubleshoot, run test scenarios and fix technical issues within the Wise solution for banks and other integration partners, assisting our API support team as a second line when issues arise.Preferred qualifications  You have at least 7 years of experience as a Software engineer or any relevant experience building backend or web applications, with experience in: Backend languages or frameworks(Java, Spring, Python, C), RESTful APIs, API Design, OAuth2.  You built and managed relationships with external partners or internal non-technical stakeholders (other product areas, c-level, etc.)  You understand the value of balancing customer centric thinking and technical skills and can bridge the gap between business and technical experts.  You put the customer above technology, while finding ways to leverage technology to improve the customer experience.  You have strong presentation and public speaking skills.

title: Tech Lead Manager( Video Data Platform), Video Infrastructure
description: Founded in 2012, ByteDance's mission is to inspire creativity and enrich life. With a suite of more than a dozen products, including TikTok, Helo, and Resso, as well as platforms specific to the China market, including Toutiao, Douyin, and Xigua, ByteDance has made it easier and more fun for people to connect with, consume, and create content.  ByteDance Video Infrastructure is one of the world's leading video platforms that provides media storage, delivery, transcoding, and streaming services. We are building the next generation video processing platform and the largest live streaming network, which provides excellent experiences for billions of users around the world. Popular video products of ByteDance are all empowered by our cutting-edge cloud technologies. Working in this team, you will have the opportunity to tackle challenges of large-scale networks all over the world, while leveraging your expertise in coding, algorithms, complexity analysis, and large-scale system design.  Responsibilities: - Drive architecture, development, maintenance of efficient, highly scalable and secured services that power TikTok's video system, including video data and video processing platform. - Aligning with product and org objectives, especially on data privacy and compliance, coordinate with cross functional teams on delivering key results.- Build and manage a strong team of software engineers  site reliability engineers, including mentoring junior team members and support team on career development.Qualifications- Bachelor or above degree in Computer Science or a related technical discipline with 5+ years' working experience. - 2+ years on managing or tech-leading a software engineer team. - Strong communication; passionate, self-motivated and good teamwork skills. - Experience as a team leader in multinational or multi-cultural background company will consider as a bonus.

title: Tech Lead, Recommendation Architecture
description: About The TeamTikTok is the leading destination for short-form mobile video. Our mission is to inspire creativity and bring joy. TikTok has global offices including Los Angeles, New York, London, Paris, Berlin, Dubai, Mumbai, Singapore, Jakarta, Seoul and Tokyo.  Our Recommendation Architecture Team is responsible for building up and optimizing the architecture for our recommendation system to provide the most stable and best experience for our TikTok users.  Responsibilities - What You'II Do • Build and manage a small team of system software engineers working on recommendation system; • Provide technical leadership to drive all phases of recommendation architecture iteration; • Work with TikTok cross-functional teams on delivering key results; • Provide team guidance, regular feedback, education, coaching and mentoring.Qualifications• Bachelor degree in computer science or a related technical discipline; • Experience in managing or tech-leading a software engineer team; • Strong experience with Data Structures or Algorithms; • Experienced in at least one area of the following areas: personalized recommendations, search engine, machine learning, distributed storage system, big data frameworks is a plus; • Strong communication and teamwork skills.

title: Aircraft Technician (Avionics)
description: Walk in InterviewST Engineering is looking to hire for these positions.Please bring along your resume and relevant qualifications.Singaporeans only.Venue: Level 1 Event Hall 1-1, 11 Eunos Rd 8, Singapore 408601 Lifelong Learning Institute - Learning Hub (Nearest MRT Station at Paya Lebar station)Time : 9am – 4pmDate : 28 Aug (Saturday) 2021Available Positions:  Aircraft Technicians (Aircraft Engine/ Avionics/ Sheetmetal/ Electronic Armament)(Nitec/ Diploma qualifications in Aerospace Technology/ Aerospace Engineering/ Avionics or related Engineering (Aerospace)  Aviation Vehicle Specialist(Class 4 driving licence and willing to do shift work)  Hangar Assistant(General cleaning of hangar and base)  Material Inspector(Nitec in engineering or have quality checks experience)  Pilot(Require 2500 hrs total, with 1000 hrs PIC Multi-engine, 500 hrs turbine time. Multi-crew experience)  Production Planner(Nitec/ Diploma in Mechanical/Aerospace/Electrical Engineering  Software Engineer(Master's/ Bachelor’s degree in Engineering (Software/Computer Science), Physics, Mathematics)Interested candidates with other relevant aerospace/ engineering experiences are welcome to come and apply as well.Please call 6914 5201 or email Royston.yapmx@stengg.com for further enquires.Responsibilities:  Test and troubleshoot instruments, components, and assemblies, using circuit testers, oscilloscopes, or voltmeters.  Test electrical equipment or systems to ensure proper functioning. Troubleshoot equipment or systems operation problems.  Install, inspect, test, adjust, or repair avionics equipment, such as radar, radio, navigation, and missile control systems in aircraft.  Complete all tasks in the allotted time frame and to the quality standards of our company, our customers and the FAA.  Promote safety within the workplace by monitoring others and yourself to guarantee all tasks are performed within the safety manual guidelines, and communicate with other mechanics and supervisors to coordinate repairs and keep apprised of safety concerns.  Keep records of maintenance and repair work. Maintain repair or maintenance records.  Order supplies, equipment, materials and parts for repairs and general maintenance.  Keep detailed records of the inspections performed, repairs finished, maintenance procedures and ordered parts.  Carry out servicing (Before Flight/Turn Round/After Flight inspection), schedule servicing, and troubleshooting and defect rectification on military aircrafts.  Support daily production and deployable to outstation project works when necessary.  Inspection of parts from suppliers conforming to stated specifications.Requirements:  Relevant Nitec/diploma qualifications in Aerospace Electronics/ Aerospace Avionics  Independent  Proactive and keen interest to learn  Willing to work on rotating shifts (Morning  Afternoon), standby  Willing to work in airbases
