title: Software Developer
description: Seeking a software engineer for ongoing IT projects in a shipping firm.Responsibilities:- Work with existing IT personnel and operations staff to ensure accurate implementation of requirements- Ensure bugs are promptly rectified- Implementing enhancements to the system designRequirements:- Diploma or Bachelor's degree in Computer Engineering, Computer Science, Information Systems, or equivalent- At least 2 years experience in ASP.NET / C# .NET, .NET Core / SQL Server / EntityFramework- Intermediate knowledge of HTML, JavaScript including frameworks such as JSON , JQuery, and CSS- A genuine interest in coding- Fresh graduates are welcomed (Local male applicants must have completed National Service)- Being able to demonstrate past projects will be an added bonus- Applicants not from relevant field of study may be considered if able to show any past personal coding projects

title: Senior Mechanical Designer
description: The Senior Software Engineer we are looking for will have the following as his/her main responsibilities:Key Responsibility:  Lead project to ensure design meet project specifications.  Design machine based on project specifications.  Generate layout drawings, design approval drawings, mechanical assembly drawings, detailed dimensional drawings, pneumatic circuit and BOM lists.  Mechanical design modularization and standardization.  Conduct factory acceptance test.  Conduct internal and end-user operation and maintenance training.  Liaise with suppliers on components selection and quotation and liaise with customers on mechanical design.  Troubleshoot mechanical design issues.  Perform system maintenance and support for system in production.  Create internal written knowledge transfer material.  Create operation and maintenance manual for machines designed.  Provide technical support and solutions to sales inquiry.  Generate proposal, costing and tender documents for sales inquiry.  Train, supervise and assist Mechanical Designer.Requirement:  Minimum Diploma in Mechanical, Mechatronics Engineering or equivalent.  Minimum 3 years of factory automation design experience.  Proficient in 3D modelling software.  Experienced in CNC automation is an advantage  Proven ability to complete tasks given independently  Ensure given tasks complete within given timeline.The remuneration package will vary according to experience and skills set.Candidates who are interested to embark on a new journey with us may click 'Apply' in the Careersfuture Portal along with your comprehensive resume.We regret that only shortlisted candidates will be notified.

title: Tech Lead Manager (Data Engineering), Video-On-Demand (VOD)
description: Founded in 2012, ByteDance's mission is to inspire creativity and enrich life. With a suite of more than a dozen products, including TikTok, Helo, and Resso, as well as platforms specific to the China market, including Toutiao, Douyin, and Xigua, ByteDance has made it easier and more fun for people to connect with, consume, and create content.  ByteDance Video-On-Demand (VOD) is a world-leading video platform that provides multi-media storage, delivery, transcoding, and streaming services. We are building the next generation video processing platform and the largest live streaming network, which provides excellent experiences for billions of users around the world.  Popular video products of ByteDance are all empowered by our cutting-edge cloud technologies. Working in this team, you will have the opportunity to tackle challenges of large-scale networks all over the world, while leveraging your expertise in coding, algorithms, complexity analysis, and large-scale system design.   Responsibilities - Craft optimal data processing architecture and systems for new data and ETL pipelines. - Design, build, and maintain efficient and reliable data pipelines to move and transform data (both large and small amounts) - Drive internal process improvements and automate manual processes for data quality and SLA management. - Excellent data mining analysis and processing ability, participate in data access, inspection, optimization and other processing processes around video qualityQualifications- BS or higher degree in Computer Science or a related technical discipline. - Strong coding and system design skills. - Experience in custom ETL/data pipeline design, implementation, and maintenance. - Experienced in big data solutions is highly desired. - 2+ years experience managing or tech-leading a software engineer team.

title: Senior Developer, Integration Platform Engineering
description: About Standard Chartered We are a leading international bank focused on helping people and companies prosper across Asia, Africa and the Middle East.   To us, good performance is about much more than turning a profit.  It's about showing how you embody our valued behaviours - do the right thing, better together and never settle - as well as our brand promise, Here for good.  We're committed to promoting equality in the workplace and creating an inclusive and flexible culture - one where everyone can realise their full potential and make a positive contribution to our organisation. This in turn helps us to provide better support to our broad client base. The Role ResponsibilitiesWe are seeking a senior software engineer to join the team building next-generation Integration Platform for the Bank. This platform is the foundation for the new API strategy and enables a modern way of connecting systems across the enterprise. You will work together with exceptional engineers to take on some of the toughest technology challenges (five-nines availability, low-latency messaging, containers and microservices) and deliver capabilities that are vital for the Bank to conduct its day-to-day operations. Scope  Impact – Independently responsible for the entire lifecycle of projects including design, development, and deploymentTechnical Execution – Write clean code, improve code structure and design in service of testability and maintainability, write and review design documentation, be highly proficient in one or more technical areasOwnership – Responsible for substantial part of the codebase; serve as on-call first responder for services the team owns; prioritize and value unowned or undesirable work that enables the team to move fasterCollaboration – Work with the team and adjacent teams to solve problems, escalate problems that have a wider scopeTeam Building – Perform code reviews; assist and teach other developers on an individual basis; participate in the hiring process, conduct interviewsOur Ideal CandidateDegree in Computer Science or equivalent10 years of experience in programming skills in server-side Java or other JVM-based language, good understanding of JVM, expertise developing solutions using web services and messaging, on premises and/or on cloudStrong knowledge of distributed systems concepts, protocols and APIs including TCP/IP, HTTP, AMQP, JMS, MQ, SOAP and experience in applying this knowledge for building resilient mission-critical systemsExperience with enterprise integration platforms like webMethods, Mule or FuseExperience in building and supporting full-stack solutions involving infrastructure, operating systems (Linux), networking and container technologies (Docker, Kubernetes)Track record of owning sizable codebase and understanding practices to ensure that other developers in the team adhere to the quality standardsHands-on CodingProgramming skills in server-side Java or other JVM-based language, good understanding of JVM, expertise developing solutions using web services and messaging, on premises and/or on cloudDistributed SystemsStrong knowledge of distributed systems concepts, protocols and APIs including TCP/IP, HTTP, AMQP, JMS, MQ, SOAP and experience in applying this knowledge for building resilient mission-critical systemsIntegration PlatformsExperience with enterprise integration platforms like webMethods, Mule or FuseCore InfrastructureExperience in building and supporting full-stack solutions involving infrastructure, operating systems (Linux), networking and container technologies (Docker, Kubernetes)Development PracticesTrack record of owning sizable codebase and understanding practices to ensure that other developers in the team adhere to the quality standardsApply now to join the Bank for those with big career ambitions.

title: Management Associate (Lighting, Engineering, Project Management)
description: The RoleYou will be responsible for :  Leading a team of engineers to deliver winning products.  Setting the project scope, timelines and budget as well as resource planning and activities scheduling.  Working closely with various stakeholders on project related matters.  Overseeing all aspects of the management and operations of the project to ensure smooth execution.  Analysing risks and mitigating these in order to ensure that the project is delivered in a timely and cost-effective manner.  Ensuring the project is in compliance with internal guidelines as well as regulatory standards and requirements.  Ensuring the development of well-designed and testable code.  Gathering and evaluating user feedback.  Providing code documentation and other inputs to technical documents.  Supporting continuous improvement by investigating alternatives and new technologies and presenting these for architectural review.  Troubleshooting and debugging to optimise performance.  Ensuring effective and efficient maintenance services of electrical and field instruments and resolving any electrical and instrumentation issues.  Ensuring electrical and instrument maintenance as per best practice, corporate policy and regulatory requirements.  Acting as a first point of contact for complex repairs and working closely with vendors to address and resolve technical issues.  Designing and developing new products within design cycle time.  Meeting target cost and manufacturability considerations.  Identifying and evaluate opportunities for implementing automation to improve productivity and quality.  Programming and testing of robots.  Managing, maintaining and improving automation systems.  Identifying the root causes of faults or problems by conducting Root Cause Analysis.  Preparing and implementing project schedules and managing all aspects of project planning.  Analysing and reporting on progress, performance and forecast on a regular basis.  Managing a team of 1-5 people.Ideal ProfileRequirements :  You possess a degree/diploma in Electrical, Electronics and Mechanical engineering.  You possess a Degree/Diploma in Computer Science, Engineering or related field.  You have at least 2 years experience, ideally within a Engineering, Project Management or Software Engineer role.  Expertise in AR/ VR, Artificial Intelligence, Electronics Design, Electrical  Instrumentation, IOT, IoT/ Automation, Project Design, Project Planning, Root Cause Analysis and Startup Experience would be highly valuable.  You have solid experience in a regional role ideally including experience covering Southeast Asia and Rest of Asia.  You possess excellent communication and influencing skills, are organised and able to multi-task effectively.  You enjoy finding creative solutions to problems  You pay strong attention to detail and deliver work that is of a high standard  You are a strong mentor and coach who builds high performing teamsWhat's on Offer?  Work alongside  learn from best in class talent, accelerated learning curve  A role that offers a breadth of learning opportunities  Opportunity to make a positive impactAbout usBehind the scenes, we have a core team of multi-disciplinary individuals from lighting designers, engineers, architects to electricians. From overall project management to handling tasks in each of the respective domains, our team seeks to become a one-stop lighting design to engineering and tech solution partner. Our goal is to value add by saving time and materials, while giving a most well thought out optimal answer for each project.Being adventurous while applying professional evaluation to justify our moves aims to give the most innovative and assured course of action. From conventional architectural public spaces, to homes, offices, malls, facades and landscape; our works have been seen everywhere. We start with creative concepts, designs, renderings, simulations, controls and installations; and will carry on to the future with maintenance, technology, engineering prowess, and a dedication to impact lives positively.Ref: 6DN9FCTVD8Apply to this role by submitting your CV and completing your profile at https://illuminatingasia.snaphunt.com/job/6DN9FCTVD8

title: Senior Data Scientist
description: Founded in 2010, Lynx Analytics is a predictive analytics company run by world-class quantitative marketing scientists and industry-experienced data scientists. Our focus is to become the world’s leading telecom analytics solution provider while advancing graph analytics technology.Reporting to the CIO, this role is an integral part of the Data Science team. The Senior Data Scientist works on and leads complex data analytics projects using state-of-art modelling and data transformation approaches as well as Lynx’s proprietary graph analysis system/customer experience management solution.She/he should be comfortable working with very large data sets residing in different data stores in disparate formats. The role requires the candidate to be strong with hands-on implementation and has the potential to move fast onto a high growth career trajectory. Our future colleague must have excellent communications skills as well as being able to visualize and present complex DS solutions for the main (C-level) stakeholders of the projects. Leadership experience and charisma are huge advantages.KEY RESPONSIBILITIES  Collecting the business requirements and designing the provided solution for a given problem  Leading the Data Science team and delivering/implementing data science solutions at the client’s location  Being responsible for the quality of deliverables  Present the results for stakeholders (in an AGILE way), get their CRs, and feedback  Collaborating with the PMO and other internal teams  Supporting pre-sales activities by drafting projects and PoCs  Create reusable documentation, presentations and code libraries from the led projects  Mentoring Data Scientists and Data Science Interns  Participating in internal education and research tasksSKILLS, QUALIFICATIONS AND EXPERIENCE  6+ years of overall experience in data mining and/or data science field.  Mathematics, Statistics, Economics, Computer Science, Engineering or related degree (MSc or PhD is preferred)  Understanding complex data science solutions and being able to implement them (like simplified AlphaGo, etc.). Knowledge in applied graph theory is an advantage  Strong knowledge of probability theory, statistics, data science algorithms and their application in Customer Retention, Campaign Management, etc. areas  Excellent communication (both verbal and written) and data visualization skills to enable stakeholders to understand complex solutions, dashboarding and reporting experience  Coding abilities in at least one of the following languages: Python (preferred), R, SAS, C, JAVA (or similar). Software Engineer skills are not needed, but the candidate is expected to be able to write simple code to prototype and test analytical ideas. GitHub knowledge is a plus.  Outstanding problem-solving skills  Strong knowledge of DWH querying languages (like SQL, Hive, Teradata, MySQL etc.) or Spark / pySpark and some experience in ETL designing  Fluency in English  Leadership experience (smaller groups or projects), being able to motivate people and deliver quality results within the given deadlines.  Willingness to travel - Up to 50% travel across the region will be required

title: Senior Architect
description: Singtel are at the leading edge of technology development to improve the experience of our customers as they consume services across mobile, voice and data infrastructure, managed services, cloud computing, IT services and professional consulting. AWS) architecture. AWS certification is a big plus  Experience in Java, Spring boot, any modern messaging technology, any Traditional and NoSQL database is a big plus

title: Area Product Owner - Digital Transformation, COO Office (Associate Director/ Director
description: Bank of Singapore opens doors to new opportunities. Start your career with Bank of Singapore as a Area roduct Owner (Director/ Executive Director) in our Digital Transformation team!At Bank of Singapore, we are constantly on the lookout for exceptional individuals to join our team. We promote a culture of openness, teamwork and fairness. Most importantly, we invest in our people through our programs that develop them on both professional and personal levels. Besides attractive remuneration packages, we offer non-financial benefits and opportunities to develop your potential within OCBC Group’s global network of subsidiaries and offices. If you have passion, drive and the will to succeed, rise to the challenge today! The CDO team is responsible for strategy and execution of change programs impacting front-office, in close partnership with our business stakeholders and the technology teams. We are looking for an Area Product Owner that has good knowledge of digital multi-channel Relationship Managers portals in Private Banking, that support day-to-day activities and facilitate advisory and execution. The person will need prior experience in managing Agile project, from the product owner perspective.  This person will be responsible for the creation and delivery of the product backlog, together with the squad, and through extensive engagement with Front Office in their various capacities (RMs, MAs, ICs, product specialists). This includes business requirements gathering and documentation, product backlog management, user acceptance testing strategy and sign off, as well as user change management/go-live activities (e.g. communications and training).Primary Responsibilities  Deliver the strategic vision of the digital Relationship Manager portal in Agile methodology in the capacity of Area Product Owner  Engage with Front Office users to understand critical user journeys, pain points, latent needs and deliver the solution that meets their requirements. At all points, ensure their requirements are understood and delivered.  Facilitate workshops and brainstorming sessions to co-create killer features  Collaborate with IT BA and software engineer to make sure requirements are well understood  Responsible for providing and clarifying the requirements in the form of user stories:    o    Collates, creates and maintains the Product Backlog    o    Refine the user stories, with a focus on clear acceptance criteria     o    Ensures artefacts that help define the product features are developed to guide the Delivery              Execution team in their implementation (e.g. UX brief, screen specs, wireframes)    o    Participates in user story grooming and sprint planning     o    Clearly communicates the business case to the Team and Stakeholders    o    Sign-off deliveries during Sprint demo    o    Participates in production verification  Prepare user training material and support user training  Engage and communicate with key stakeholders on project status, key risks and issues  Ensure that project deliverables achieve synergy with business processes, which includes re-defining business processes, where applicableRequirements  Minimum 10-15 years of solid experience as a Business Analyst/ Junior Product Owner, in delivering in complex, cross-functional technology-related projects in banking, preferably in a Private Bank  Experience in working with end users, to gather requirements and translating them into User Stories, for technology team to implement.  A driven self-starter who is delivery focused and possesses strong communication, influencing and presentation skills  Robust stakeholder management skills and good interpersonal skills  Ability to demonstrate conceptual thinking skills  Can work confidently and collaboratively with cross-functional stakeholders of varying seniority  Experience in working with agile methodology, use of Jira.  Knows/ willing to learn gherkin user stories.  Organized with a natural inclination for planning strategy and tactics  Can work independently, is pragmatic and enjoy high energy levels  Thrive in a fast-paced environment and is able to adapt to various demands in a diverse culture  Familiar with relevant rules and regulations, in particular those relating to local private banking business  Has ability to multi-task and meet multiple deadlines

title: Senior Technology Consultant
description: Job Description6Estates is a growing AI Fintech company, and we are currently hiring a Senior Technology Consultant to oversee our commercial projects with our clients in the Financial Services Industry, from conception through to implementation.ResponsibilitiesAs a valued member of our team, you will play a key role in the business development of our AI solutions, proposals preparation and delivery of projects. We are looking for a candidate who has practical, hands-on experience for full AI project cycle, including the preparation of technology solution proposals, milestones, resource planning, task allocation, mapping of dependencies and managing timely delivery. Experience in evaluating the implications of use of new technologies, such as Artificial Intelligence and Intelligent Document Processing on the business strategies are an advantage.In this context, your responsibilities will primarily be to:· Oversee the solution consulting process in pre-sales;· Oversee the delivery of key projects and build trust in relationships with clients;· Lead and contribute to the whole project life-cycle from development of proposals to delivery;· Gain a deep understanding of our clients’ business needs and pain points with feedback and understand their needs, requirements and issues;· Proactively identify and create opportunities to bring our AI expertise to existing and new clients;· Contribute with innovative ideas to continue developing new product features as well as contributing to execute our growth strategyJob Requirements· Degree in Computer Science, Engineering or Information Technology;· Have a minimum of 12 years of IT relevant working experience;· Prior entrepreneurship is a pre-requisite;· Prior software engineer working experience is a must;· Strong knowledge in ERP solutions and AI solutions is a must;· Prior working experience in MNC is an advantage;· Strong practical and extensive experience in the realization optimization of programmed advertising internet app and data analysis is an advantage;· Strong expertise in business process definition and program management in a digital transformation context;· Strong background in project management, account management, preferably in a technology setting with the ability to understand processes supporting data analytics projects- Have strong analytical and problem-solving skills with the ability to discern key issues and deal with them effectively;- Have excellent written and verbal communication skills English and Mandarin; knowledge of Indonesia Bahasa is an added advantage.
